product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Anonymous
content:
This, like Nests indoor cameras, has an outstanding quality image and the recordings are very nice to have. The paid service to save your history is a bit overpriced in my opinion so you may want to pick and choose which cameras you subscribe to.

The unit itself is well built quality wise, the camera is easy to mount and aim and stays in place well with the super strong magnet that holds it.

However, the cable design is absolutely awful. You have 25 total feet of cable, in two 10 and 15 foot sections. And right in the middle of these two sections is a huge round blob/block that connects the two. Hiding the cable is a little difficult since its thick, so thieves could easily see it and cut the cable or just cover their face and cut the cable right at the camera itself and then have no issues. The big round block is so big it stands out like a sore thumb, inviting thieves to simply unplug it and then they are no longer on camera. And it's also so big that putting it inside of a standard electrical box is the only real option you have to hide it... aside form having it hidden behind the wall outside which could be a code violation.

I believe it needs a safety cuff around the cable at the camera that is coated with something that can't be cut, there needs to be a screw or similar to make it stay attached to the magnet and the cable design needs to be completely redone by someone who knows what they are doing.

With that said, the quality is excellent both night and day and having quick and easy access via the Nest app anywhere is really nice. Mine alerts me when packages arrive, the mail is here, people come to my yard etc.

I would give the installation a real serious going over and consult with your electrician before buying this product, especially if you have a window inside you can simply place one of the indoor cams in to see outside. That exposed cable is just too much of a security risk, ironic since its supposed to be a security camera.
title: Great camera - terrible cable design

I originally bought a 2 pack of nest outdoor cams.  I only had a few days to get them installed before a long trip out of town. I went through the manual step by step to ensure everything was working. Both cameras were nested in the app and working before I installed them as per the manual.

Then the first cam that was installed went dark. After referencing the manual, I determined it went into some sort of bootup loop and doesn't function at all. 

The place of purchase didn't have anymore to do a swap. And nest won't allow a swap, until they are satisfied it is broken. Just hurts when you're far from home without the ability to trouble shoot it a second time around, due to there long online wait times and lack of ability to receive phone calls.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BrettG
content:
It does what it’s supposed to and it does it quite well. 

Getting the camera running is very simple just like all of the other Nest products. Plug it in, scan the barcode, connect to WiFi, and you’re done. Installing this camera to run off indoor power is another story. Fortunately, I was installing this outside of my garage, overlooking my driveway so I was able to sneak the wire through the vinyl soffit and power it from the same outlet as my garage door openers. Others may not be so lucky depending where you install the camera. Do note that you should make every attempt possible to power this from inside your home. I am not sure what the point of having it powered outside would be as it can then be easily disconnect or stolen. If you are having a hard time with finding an indoor outlet and a place for the giant AC adapter, you could always get a POE adapter/splitter and forego the Nest power disc…

Now onto the Nest camera itself. I am getting great video quality, the audio is a nice feature, notifications and motion capture works wonderfully. 24/7 recording is a breath of fresh air compared to the Arlo cameras I use inside my home. They do a decent job at capturing motion, but I have had a couple missed events. The wife didn’t want me running wires so the Arlo system worked out nicely in terms of being able to hide the cameras away. To be honest, I don’t want 24/7 video of the inside of my home being pumped into the internet anyways. On the outside, I want 24/7 video, and you should as well. There is a lot of information that leads up to an event and a lot that happens after an event…

The Nest Outdoor cam has great build quality and works just as I had hoped. Daytime footage is perfect while nighttime is something to be desired. I am getting a ton of glare/interference from the IR LEDs. I believe this is from the IR light being reflected off the nearby gutter and wall. I need to try repositioning it to see if it goes away. Also, you can use the digital zoom to crop out any interference and the exposure will be readjusted. 

The only real downside I can think of is the data usage. Most broadband service comes with a data cap nowadays. So be mindful of how much data you are consuming with these. If you are a heavy hitter with streaming content, a couple Nest cams may put you over the edge. In terms of video quality vs data usage: Low = 30gb/mo, Med = 120gb/mo, and High = 300gb/mo. 

For those complaining about having to pay for Nest Aware, think about what you are getting for a measly $5/mo or $50/year. You are getting continuous 24/7 recording with cloud storage of 1080p video for 5 days, smart notifications, etc. If something was to happen, you are going to know within 5 days and you can download & save all the video you need. Alternatively, you could buy an IP camera, build a decent computer and buy/run BlueIris which would work just as well as the Nest setup. However, at that point, you are already at least $500 into managing 1 camera and all the maintenance & support is on you. In retrospect, $50 or $100 per year isn’t really that bad for what you are getting. Keep in mind, you are essentially paying for the convenience of not having to set up and monitor a security camera yourself. Would it be nice if Nest allowed access to the private stream so that you could use BlueIris to store the 24/7 stream locally? Yes, I would like nothing more. However, Nest is a company, and the goal of any company is to make money. (To some degree, you can do this, but it’s pretty poor since access to the RTMP stream was removed from sharing.)

All in all, I am pleased. Before buying these, you should do your homework and know the limitations & requirements of utilizing the Nest cameras.
title: Security & Convenience

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Homeowner
content: I have both Arlo Pro and the Nest Cam Outdoor cameras. I find the quality of the recording of the Nest Camera to be better than the Arlo Pro. I also like the continuous 24/7 recording that the Nest camera provides. One thing I hope there will be an improvement on with the Nest camera is the ability to configure the alerts. What I mean by that is, with the Arlo Pro, for EVERY detection, I will see an alert. I never miss one. Never. With the Nest, it works differently. When you get an alert for a motion detection, there is a quiet window period where there will be no more alerts. For the next 20-30 minutes or so after an alert, the Nest system stops sending you alerts. When I spoke with Nest customer service, they indicated that is by design and is not configurable. So if you get the first alert, but 15 minutes later another event had occurred, one would not get another alert for it. Nest should allow this time period to be configurable. Other than that, I have been very happy with the Nest camera in general.
title: Happy with purchase

The quality is literally breathtaking and since they are so powerful; they do need to be plugged into a source of power which didn’t bother me. I was able
to his it behind the siding on my home as it is was built over 100 years ago and my friend who also owns this brand of cameras was able to drill a small home into his eves and run the wires within the attack.

It comes with professional wire holding mounts which screw in and the wire can be painted without any issue. You can also discreetly run the wire through a window such as I did and window will still close and screen will stay in place. I have an alarm system with sensors on all windows and it didn’t cause any issues with the sensors either and you can hardly even see the wire running inside a window. I only had to do this with one camera and the window is upstairs.

The attached image is shown on a Google Home Hub and since I have so much smart home products, it is in 720 and not 1080 until I upgrade my internet speed. The camera(s) doesn’t use that much bandwidth, it’s all the other 12 items logged into my network.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: socom
content:
Who this is for: People who want to keep tabs on welcome or unwelcome guests on the front porch, back deck, garage, pool area, driveway, or anywhere else outside.

Why I like it: With the Nest, you get 24/7 recording in crystal-clear 1080p, rather than just clips of action. The camera sends smartphone alerts and keeps a detailed in-app timeline when motion occurs. More importantly, the Nest Cam Outdoor is the only camera we’ve found that’s completely waterproof, which includes the power cord and adapter. That means it can withstand the outdoor elements a lot longer than you can. It requires the Nest Aware subscription service if you want to view your footage.
title: A Great HD Camera

author: GMcD
content: We installed 2 cameras at our front door over two weeks ago and are happy with them. Daytime picture clarity is great, night is still very acceptable. Video is real time, but notifications are a little delayed so the mail man will have dropped off a parcel and be back down the steps by the time the notification comes through. I really wanted these to check on parcel deliveries, and this is a great solution for us.
title: Clear picture, decent price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jose
content: I really would have liked to stay with this item but unfortunately my wifi was not strong enough. However, while it was inside and near my router, it had excellent camera quality and I loved how I was able to see everything on my phone. I will recommend to those who know they have a long ranged wifi connection or those who are willing to buy wifi extenders.
title: Wanted to but couldn't

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Vince
content: This is a great value especially if you need more than one camera. The camera quality is clear. As you start to add more cameras you probably should upgrade your internet speed and router system to a mesh system. I have all nest/Google cameras and my router is Google as well.
title: Great value

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Lamreyes
content: I have 3 in my home. I have no idea how I ever did without them! Such peace of mind and great resource. I can see if my kids are home, if dogs are digging up the yard, or if I left awning open. Best yet....Major package carrier tried to argue that an item I was missing must have been taken out of package and stolen at my front steps. The moment I told them I had Nest cam that showed driver delivering an empty piece of cardboard, they backed down. I believe the newer NEST Cam version is better in terms of video quality and will look into getting one soon for better image around driveway area.
title: Cannot live without them!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: bill
content: Easy enough to install if you watch their videos Check your wifi connection with cam powered up IN HOUSE BEFORE you even drill a hole outside This will determine where you can place it and have it upload video I installed one on face of garage using masonry spade bit to run wiring into attic then hole in garage ceiling to plug in on ceiling outlet Second one i mounted on back of house and ran wiring up to attic through hole in soffit Used extension cord in attic to hole in garage ceiling again Will use the Nest monthly service to have extended time to review video playback
title: Love the video quality

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: jfhman001
content: Realible. Bought this nest cameras for my parents house. Its great and easy to use. Just pay monthly if you want your videos stored in the cloud or otherwise free first 4 hours that's being recorded.
title: Nest the best.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MarkTrail63026
content: Great camera and easy to install and set up. Installed on my patio for security. Motion activation is sensitive enough to pick up squirrels and stray cats. I can stream video to the Nest app on my phone or my Google Nest Hub.
title: Good Video

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Orip67
content: we have several of the nest cameras.  they work great, record and save alerts - as well as being able to see every second over the past 5 days.  however we recently purchased the competitor's camera, and they are only $10 per month for everything we add.
title: nice cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jwm351
content: These cams do the trick there is no doubt!  My one and only real complaint is that you can not turn off notification for specific times.  Ex; I have one watching my back yard.  I do not want alerted in the evening, but during the day and at night.  It would be nice to turn off notifications (not camera) during the evening hours.
title: Nice Outdoor cams

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Robert
content:
I've used multiple outdoor cams now, and this is by far the best cloud-service based cam I've seen. The Ring Stick-up is nice, but there's a delay since it's battery powered. The Flir cam is decent, but the night vision is terrible. This cam has great 1080p video, both day and night.

The only thing people might not like is the Nest Aware subscription cost, as it is pricey compared to some others. What you get from it though seems worth it to me, so I don't have a problem paying for it. You do get a 30 day trial period when you sign up though, so you can try it for yourself and decide.

The camera comes with a 25' cord too, which is fantastic. Most of the other plugged in cams don't come with anything as long, and have required me to use extension cords in the past. I prefer the plugged in cams since they generally record all the time, compared to battery operated cams that only record when they detect motion (which results in a delay in recording).
title: Best outdoor cam so far

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: PSG1
content: Easy to install and provides safety and security to my home.  I have purchased several other nest products and found them all to be really great products.
title: Great security camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Lilly
content: I am not tech smart, so my son in law put these up. I liked them so much I bought another set which he will put up this weekend. They finally went on sale, which is why I bought the second set, and it's wonderful all that I can see. I live in the boonies so security is not just around the corner.  but with these I can see who is at my door, coming down the long driveway, who is around my out buildings and even know when a skunk is there so I can stay inside until he wanders off.  Very happy with the purchase, just need a few more lessons from my S-I-L to know how everything works.
title: Best eve so far!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Good12334
content:
I love these cameras the reason I gave them a 4 start is cause I wish they would be better in video quality.
During the day they look great but the night vision looks blurry and hard to make out the vehicle’s that pass.
title: Security cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: joan
content: I bought this Google - Nest Cam Outdoor 1080p Security Camera - White for my daughter to point at the neighborhood mailboxes.  It works very well.
title: nest camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Pjay

The cameras have caught several incidents; crashes, vandalism, etc. The cameras have been used for reports to law enforcement as well. 1080p is perfect. The subscription is also a must-do as nest does provide a fair rate for a decent amount of storage space.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

content:
I like them. Ease of installation big plus. I like that I can view any camera and like that I get notification. 

The only issue is clarity of the picture.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: mact312

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Electrictrader
content: I had to replace a camera that failed on my Airbnb property. This did the job. The only thing I dislike is that I have to scan the back of the device for my service to recognize it. Since I have multiple people who need access I have to climb the ladder multiple times to get them set up too. The camera wiring is a little clunky and has a large 0.75" connector with a USB on it that has to be plugged into a power outlet. It would have been better if I could have it firmly fixed without the magnet and then wirelessly connected to the server.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Rick

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Asantana
content: This camera is great. The quality of the picture is amazing and it picks up sound and motion great. We weren’t sure how it would work on the app with the nest doorbell but it’s super easy to see, navigate, and use on the app. Located where it gets really hot and hasn’t seemed to be an issue at all with the heat.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: RDYMNT
content: I already have a few cameras so this bundle that comes with two is a great deal. They have great quality video and they're easy to set-up.
title: Keep your home safe

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Akoboe
content:
Great cameras. Had Arlo, but finally made the switch to nest for tighter integration into Google Home / Assistant. I was concerned about these being wired and not wireless, but it is really easy to feed the cable up into the soffit on your roof and plug into an outlet in the attic. Wifi connection strength is great. 

Yes nest aware is a subscription service but their new plan where you have one charge for all your cameras makes it a much better value

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

content:
As the summary states this cameras pack a high end quality for the price. While they aren’t the cheapest cameras out there. I believe they are one of the best if not the best. The nest app works seemlesly and is elegant and beautiful. I never struggle with it. I have the whole family. The Yale smart lock, the nest Thersmostat and the nest hello. 

Unfortunately I love my iPhone and I’ll be making my home work with my HomeKit app. I know google won’t allow nest to be integrated to HomeKit. The is a home bridge but honestly I don’t trust them and I feel that my privacy might be at risk. Therefore I am moving on. Thank you nest you are great. Hopefully in the future once you offer HomeKit services I’ll be moving back to you :).

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

Sometimes these cameras lapse and do not report activity for long periods of time. I would recommend to anyone who just generally wants to look over their property, but would recommend something a bit more functional for those protecting their spaces for safety reasons.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Opie
content: Excellent pic quality. Wide view is awesome. But big negative.. must pay for the record and playback feature. If you don't, can only see still photo of something detected, back maybe a couple hours. Can view live which is nice but will eat phone battery. You do get notifications that something was noticed in the cameras view if you sign up for it. That part is free. You can hook up to a home computer and view live all day if wanted. Over all we like this camera. BUT, Can buy a DVR surveillance system and keep all your recordings for the price it would cost to have recordings saved to the cloud in a year. 30 bucks a month is one option, for 30 days of recordings. Will most likely buy another DVR system.
title: Must Pay Monthly

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Dr128bit
content: This Nest camera records 24/7, day or night, rain or shine. It comes with a 25 foot cable and all you need is an electrical outlet to plug it in. It records both video and audio. If someone is near the camera, you can even talk to them using your iPhone or iPad. The video quality is respectable for a wireless camera. It cost $5 monthly for 24/7 cloud recording for a single camera. Additional cameras will cost you extra. I highly recommend this camera over Ring and Arlo, because those other brands can't record 24/7. You don't want to miss anything, and you don't want to deal with dead batteries.
title: Highly recommend. It records 24/7!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: RogerG
content: Have nest products all over my home. They are of quality, from the packaging down to the item itself.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jordan
content: If you are already part of or are planning on getting into the Google/Nest eco system then this product is for you! I love being connected to my home even when I am away. The Nest Cam gives me piece of mind when I am home or away. I have two cameras, the original nest indoor Cam and now this one. This camera is great and the functionality that Nest offers is amazing. If you already have a Nest Cam and are looking into this one as I did, the biggest thing I would be aware of is how the camera mounts. This isn't an issue but it is very different than the indoor and should definitely be considered. I had to change some of my mounting plans when I realized this. I love the Google/Nest home products though, and this is the 19th product piece of theirs that I have purchased and added into my home eco system.
title: Awesome Functionality

The only issue we have is that our cameras go offline a lot for brief periods of time. We aren’t sure if that’s a camera issue or a bandwidth issue though. We have 600mb fiber internet and a top of the line router.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Gina
content: Love my nest cams. These are extras for outside. They work great!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: wellfleetion
content: I had Arlo’s and they were a joke. Always offline! These are rock solid and the picture is decent. I’m taking a star away because when you dl saved video it’s not time/date stamped. That’s crazy as you may want to use the video as evidence in court and the date/time stamp should be embedded. Just update the software accordingly. Easy fix.
title: It’s a solid cam

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MostEligableBachelorInKC
content:
Pretty fun outdoor camera. 
I use mine at the front door. Set up is kind of a pain but only because getting the right angle to see as much as you can takes time and patience. 

Advice when you set up, split your router. - Create a second channel, 2.4hz vs the 5hz. (Ask your internet provider on how to do this if you're a novice like me) I had difficulty getting a signal/live feed and once I created the 2.4hz and reconnected, I haven't had any difficulty viewing a live feed. 

I gave 4 out of 5 because they don't tell you this until after you buy it, but you have to pay for recorded history. If you don't pay, you only get 3 hours worth of memory. But to get 10 days worth of history, it's really not that much money a year and then 30 days is just 3x as much as the 10 day. So not terrible but I wish I would have known that before I purchased this device. 

It is pretty cool that its all seemless in the nest app, I have the nest thermostat and this camera and is easy to view live images and switch to the nest thermostat
title: Pretty Cool

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: AppleGawd
content: So far so good, the cameras are working as expected. Got these to keep an eye on the house while away. Love getting notifications to my phone and being able to see who approaches my doors at any time. Also, I enjoy the option to talk to people through the cameras as well, great purchase.
title: Great Outdoor cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: 80sGameGuy
content: I love the nest product and this was a great buy. Chose not to spend the extra for iq but sometimes wish I went for the iq. Serves its purpose and let’s me keep an eye on the outside. Highly recommend!
title: Obsessed

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: DocHoliday
content: Previously bought the Nest indoor camera and was happy with it. Outdoor camera works perfectly. Camera mounted on garage in back, connects to my WiFi router which is inside near front of house. Ran wires through hole I drilled in garage wall to inside power, found some rubber grommets at hardware store to plug hole as the connector demands a hole much larger than the wire - would have been nice if this was smaller but the wiring is all single form factor (I'm guessing for weather protection). Working fine now for about 10-12 weeks. Wish the Nest monitoring storage fees were cheaper but you can get real time image w/o the monthly fee.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: amber
content: I bought the two pack because it's a better deal for each camera than to buy them individually. I had to pay someone to mount them because they were mounted to brick. I would say the installation was very difficult because the power cord has the usb adaptor attached to it and so you have to drill a one inch hole through your siding, which in my case was brick. I don't know why they couldn't make that piece detachable so i could have drilled a much smaller hole and i could have installed it myself. The quality of the videos are amazing and i get quick alerts when it senses motions. I love the fact that when I get the alert on my phone it shows me a quick 3 shot burst so I can quickly see if it's a real issue or just my cat. The IR mode is very clear and I can make out a face on the camera. I know a lot of people complain about paying for cloud space. No I don't like that either and I think they should offer a 24 hour recording for free. I don't need 10 days worth of recording let alone 30 days but I told everyone who questioned me paying for the service that I just paid 100.00 for two of my kids to play video games online for a year, I think I can pay 150.00 to protect my house. I love that I can see what's going on outside my house when I'm not there. I hope to buy some indoor cameras soon. I won't be buying the storage space for those but again, it would be nice if they offered 24 hours for free. If they did that, I would already have bought multiple indoor cameras. In the mean time, I'll just wait. I would definitely recommend these cameras to anyone who's looking for good quality outdoor cameras.
title: Great Cameras

The IR is good and I combine the cameras with motion led flood lights. I would have liked to get the Nest Outdoor IQ, but the Nest Outdoor Camera is perfect for my needs. Cameras are a necessity in today's world. Don't skimp out on security! Get cameras, motion lights, and an alarm system.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: AttorneyGuy
content: I bought these Nest cams on sale in February 2019, and I set them up myself. I love that you can plug these cameras into an outdoor outlet as opposed to having to drill through the exterior of the house to reach an indoor outlet. There are other cameras on the market that use rechargeable batteries, but I just can't see myself going up on a ladder every 3 or 4 months to recharge them. I added these Nest cameras to go along with my Nest Hello doorbell cam. It's a great system, with a great app. You have to pay a monthly fee for video storage (if you WANT storage), but it's only $3 a month. Think about how much we paid for security camera systems in the 1990s and early 2000s. We've come a long way!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: movielover
content:
I bought this for my house. Already installed two, and this time additional ones to cover my backyard.
Overall satisfied, but need a few enhancement for the best use;
- capturing too wide angle; when installed near wall under roof, its night vision highlight too bright from wall, and the rest of screen goes too dark to see anything
- can define a zone, but cannot let it monitor this defined zone only. When installed at the front yard, it covers side walk of the street. I would like to define a zone which covers only my drive way and want to get notification when motion is detected only within this zone, but it fails. Whenever a person walks through the side way or a car passes on the street, it sends notification to me; sometimes annoying and false alarm
- Can download video clip when any motion is sensed, even though it records 24/7.

Wish they can improve them better.
title: Great but need a few enhancement

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SaltyTerp
content:
I was adding this to another dude if my fathers house where I already have a nest camera installed.   I aimed it at both the front door and driveway.  It did not trigger notifications for movement at the front door even though it is clearly covered.
Also, I tried sharing access with my other siblings, but if you don’t have a gmail email address, that’s a No Go.  Another problem with Nest cameras is that you can’t pause a video while looking at it in a smart phone, you have to be on a computer to do that.  Finally, if you don’t pay extra for the monthly cloud backup, any playback is pretty useless.  Nest and Google need to step up their game, because there are so many other cameras out there that do more for a fraction of the cost (I’m using Wyze at another property and been very happy with that.)
title: Overpriced - underperforming

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: ConnieB
content: If you think you are going to have live surveillance without purchasing the monthly surveillance plan, then think again. What you actually get is a snap shot of some activity that gives you very little information. For instance, you will get a snapshot of a car that enters the activity zone but it will NOT provide any other activity that happens after the initial snapshot. You won't know if someone exited the car and/or breached your zone without purchasing a plan.
title: Buyer Beware: Requires monthly plan

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NeOn
content: I installed this camera outside my front door. The main purpose of this is to make sure I keep track of the activities outside when I'm away, as well as making sure my packages are delivered accordingly without walking away by itself. So far I'm liking the performance, very clear videos stored on the cloud. Everything you need to install is included, from the screws to the mounting brackets . The only problem I have is the notification. It usually prompts me between 10 to 20 seconds when it senses some activities. It has nothing to do with the wireless connectivity as it has a very strong signal from where it is installed. But other than that, I'm cool with it. Thinking of buying the indoor camera next.
title: Clear Video, Easy Access

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: rolivas06
content: Easy installation... great app... and best thing is it records 24/7 (unlike Ring that records only with Motion)... also has option to remove night vision for those homes with floodlights and would like to record with color at night.  Only down side is microphone/speaker works like a radio... cant speak over eachother like an intercom...
title: Great home camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: StevieG
content: I  have 8 at 2 different homes, great cameras. See lots of interesting things,  great quality,
title: Love my Nest Cams!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JayM
content: I have purchased both indoor and outdoor nest cameras for security purposes. The cord for the outdoor camera is fantastic. However, I did have an issue with the wifi. The further you got away from the front door the less likely the camera would connect. My sister had the same issue. The camera is awesome during the day but I'm not too satisfied with it at night. While it's nice to be able to view basics of what happened during the night you can NOT get much detail from the night vision. It's much clearer at night when it's focused on a specific area with a bright light as opposed to a broad area like your front yard. Otherwise people look like the dark figures and you can't identify cars well. Either way, I'm satisfied with my purchase. I think everyone should invest in one, it's well worth the $10 a month for Nest Aware.
title: Satisfied

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: RK01
content: Great camera! Works well, and picks up sound from everywhere!
title: Great camera for beginners!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Scott737
content: Cameras work well, zone setup and notifications could be a little more accurate
title: Good

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bucco
content: Picture is pretty clear, but the nighttime vision makes green grass look like snow.
title: Good quality camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: marwith
content: The Nest camera provides a clear picture and the app gives the instant information I need.  I love being able to see packages being delivered, who has walked up to my door and if any problems occur.  The ability to save /share recordings and use them when needed has given us a greater piece of mind.
title: Wonderful Camera System

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JohnnyB
content: The camera image is extremely good.  My first one stopped working but Nest, (after painful tech support process), replaced it promptly. Replacement unit is working fine.  Facial recognition is cool and ties in great with other Google Home products.  Very happy.  Just wish they would provide options to purchase with different power cord lengths.
title: Great camera and tech

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Shell
content: This is my 4th Nest outdoor camera. It is very good quality in last two years. Very reliable.
title: Very good deal as a bundle

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BobbyArms
content: Can’t believe the quality of this camera.... a must have
title: Amao

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: OhioJimbo1803
content:
The camera is great...BUT...you can NOT use it for anything but a "live" view unless you BUY a subscription! Not even a small "cloud" storage of videos is available. With this set-up, If you want to see what happened with your package, you have to be watching LIVE and that defeats the purpose of security. If you want to pay a monthly subscription, you can get the minimum of 5days archive clips. I wasted money on TWO of these and now, they just tell me when it sees "motion" or "hears" a noise, but there are no files to preview at a later date! Completely USELESS without the subscription!!! DON'T BUY IT!!!
Do NOT buy it as a gift for anyone unless you want them to be angry with you.
title: NO! Don't do it!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Rich
content:
Works well setup was easy night vision is great
Happy customer
title: Great Product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Zac87
content: I was convince with all the good reviews these cameras have. They r wort every penny and very very reliable.
title: Best cameras out there in the market

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: leavion
content:
I really like the fact that the camera is always recording and doesn't start recording only when it detects movement. I had a different device that recorded only when movement was detected and most of the time I would see the back of the person rather than the face because of the lag.

Overall I like the nest camera with two issues:

1. The fee for the cloud recording can be steep. Nest corrected this somewhat when they added a new 5 day storage tier which is cheaper than the existing 10 and 30 day storage tiers.

2. The AI doesn't always alert me when a person is clearly visible. This is not very common though and you can still see the person because the camera records 24x7.
title: Great camera with few issues

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Eduardo
content: excellent image quality unfortunately communication between people does not have the same quality
title: Very good

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: hufftc
content: I owned one of these and then loved it so much I bought another one to mount outside. Only down side is that you have to run the wire and if a power outage happens then your cameras are down.
title: Great outdoor camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Dakota
content: The cameras have a nice area coverage and allow for zoom.  I like being able to do house checks while away.  Still learning about the product capabilities and placements.
title: Nice coverage area

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: iatricsb
content: I researched this item quite a bit before making the purchase. Many of the site reviews rated them as the top WiFi security camera, so I went for it. I have not been disappointed. The ability to zoom in is nice and the night view and/or low light capabilities are great. If I had any complaint at all, it would be the range it can be from our WiFi router. We have a very powerful router that allows me to get 5 bars anywhere inside the house. This is at a far corner and if it was any further away, it probably would not connect. But it did connect (on my 2nd attempt) and has worked great since. No regrets and I hope to be able to purchase another one for the other corner of the house. Having a 25 foot plug was a plus.
title: Highest rated WiFi Camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NHParrothead
content:
I'm very pleased with the Nest cameras I purchased. Both have a very high quality display and work as described! I think the advantages to plugging in outweigh the disadvantages to the battery powered cameras offered by other brands. 

My only complaint with the Nest, aside from the required subscription, is the number of "false" motion alerts. We've set up some custom zones, and perhaps have to experiment a bit more with them, but it seems like we get alerts every time a branch blows, a shadow moves, or ANYTHING happens outside! 

On the plus side, Nest advertises that the motion sensor only has a range of like 20-25 feet. I've found it alerts me to motion 50+ feet away from the camera! The down side is distinguishing between nonsense and actual things I need to see. 

Overall though, very pleased! I would recommend, and if I had it to do all over again, I'd purchase with confidence!
title: Works as described

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Cheriporras
content: I already own a. Few nest cameras and love the quality along with the ease of us.
title: Great quality

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: CatCity
content: I’ve been using this camera for about a year outside of my office, and so far, it works perfectly. I was worried that the rainy environment I live in (Portland) may take a toll on the camera, but it hasn’t. The quality is wonderful, and the angle is very wide.
title: Great outdoor camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Happy
content: They are very clear. The one thing I noticed is that in the Android platform the voice to speak to people is very low. On the iOS platform it’s a little louder just enough to hear. The volume is not adjustable on either OS. Other than that they are ok.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

content: These cameras are great and have excellent clarity. They get good WiFi signal and hardly go offline. I have the google WiFi 3 pack connected to these. I haven’t experienced many issues. I would recommend to anyone looking to buy quality outdoor cameras.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Papeeps
content:
These are great products. I really like mine. I have 3 around my house but you need to consider the following:

1) Do I have a place to plug them in? Check the two cables provided and make sure the length is correct. If you are passing the cords through a hole, make sure you know how fat the connector and the plug are otherwise, you might not be psyched to drill larger holes.
2) Regardless of your intent record 24x7 or just when they detect movement, you have to have enough data in your plan as well as enough bandwidth, otherwise you might not be happy.
title: Excellent but keep this in mind..

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: kchap74
content:
I needed an outdoor camera option for my garage interior and front door. I’ve used the Nest DropCam in my home and prefer their cameras because the video is encrypted at the camera before being sent over the internet. 

These cameras worked EXACTLY as expected. I receive motion and person notifications, and the mic/speaker work really well with the Nest App. Highly Recommended!!!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Corrie
content:
This product is great to watch your property or wildlife.
The night vision is auto switching which is good but not good enough resolution to make out a license plate less than 20' away.
If you are is a remote location using a hotspot with unlimited data, 2 cameras with the resolution on high will work most of the time. 3 will lag and keep asking you to reduce the resolution because your wifi is not fast enough, and we are a half mile from the cell tower with great signal strength!
3 or more cameras will need fast internet connection to stream 3 cameras with "high" resolution.
title: Good stand alone product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Clint
content:
I bought two of these, four cameras in total. You NEED great Wi-Fi all over your house. One wireless router won't cut it. It's rare that all four are showing video feed at the same time. The connectivity is bad. I have had to spend more money in increasing the range of the Wi-Fi of the house, I don't even have a big house. Even the cameras close to the router (with in 15 feet) have a hard time connecting. When connecting the cameras you have to use your phone to choose a Wi-Fi network, even if the cameras see the network and the network has internet connection, they still don't always connect. Before installing go through the trouble of bringing the camera outside where you want so you can see the video feed and make it connects. 

If you want good video quality and reliability you probably shouldn't go with Wi-Fi cameras. If I could go back I would.  Nest thermostats are great, the doorbell camera is great, these cameras are horrible.
title: High Hassel, Low Video quality, Bad Connectivity

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MJZa

title: WiFi Camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Papy
content: I purchased a Nest outdoor cam about a year ago and signal kept dropping. I called Nest support and was told that I had a weak signal. I kept moving the outdoor cam and the router in closer proximity to one in other but still the same issue. I bought the replacement warranty from Bestbuy and got a NEW Nest outdoor cam and my issues got resolved. I feel the original cam was defective and not the placement issue I was originally told. The cam now works wonderfully that’s why I gave the rating I did!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bob9

It's only a few bucks a month for 5 day video history and all the other feature, but I feel those should be included in the camera itself. Also, I ended up having to get a WiFi extender to reach the camera, as it kept going offline due to dropped connection.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Hookem82
content: I first bought the ring outdoor cam completely garbage terrible video quality always grainy and only 720p was way less than that for sure returned got the nest crystal clear video and audio great night vision as well ring didn't even work at all only reason I'm not giving five stars two reason you have to pay monthly for the video cloud storage service 10$ month for 10 days saved or 30$ for the month which is completely bs in my opinion second the camera goes offline once or twice a day for 10 min don't know why but it's done it since the day I bought it other than that I'm very happy with it also if you don't have a strong internet connection you better plan on getting one cause that how the camera work the lower the speed the lower the video quality
title: Nest Outdoor Came

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bill
content: I had high hopes for this camera, I'm sure many people will use this item without any complaints, but my major issue with this item is its DC transformer. This device ships with a long cable. A plug inserts into your 110v receptacle, and there's a cord, maybe about 20 feet. In the middle of the cable lies a round DC transformer, and then about another 10 feed of cable leading into the camera. This poses an aesthetics issue when this devices is installed on the exterior of your dwelling: the security camera leaves exposed cabling. If you truly want a secure camera, one would tend to install its cabling inside conduit, but with this weird transformer, it proves impossible to install this thing in conduit without cutting the cable and splicing... not something that I wanted to do on a $200 item. I returned it.
title: Disappointed

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: KingofTopaz
content: I had it mounted on the soffit 3 months ago, pointed at the front driveway and it has worked flawlessly since. I get emails/texts when there is a person in the front yard (yes it can tell the difference between a human and a cat) and a little ding to let me know. Colors are true and deep and picture is sharp. I got the $50/year recording package and strongly recommend this unit to anyone who is looking for good security.
title: I can see all 24/7

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: ShadowFox
content: I have 3 of these cameras on the exterior of my house, along with the Nest Door Bell and 2 interior cameras. They integrate well with Alexa and the Nest App. Picture quality is great. Also, if you ever change your password, you need to rescan the code on the camera itself, which can be a pain if its mounted high under an eve. Overall though, I highly recommend them to anyone looking, just plan ahead.

author: BikesandStuff
content: I already have 2 of these outside, but got more when they were on sale. I really like the quality and functionality of these, just wish the cloud hosting was free. It's worth it for the safety and functionality, and the quality of build and resolution far exceeds Arlo.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kathy
content: Very good but keeps going off line! Only had it for 2 weeks hopefully it will stop going offline when I have it longer!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Trish
content: Love my outdoor camera. Great picture quality even at night. Love it!  I have 2 ring cameras but I love the nest more.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Nena94

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kelvin
content: Nest Cams outdoors have generally been very reliable for me. No dropped connections besides the occasional power outage at home which is not the camera's fault. It is clear, and picks up backyard movements when random geese/dogs walk by from neighbors. The subscription can be a turn off to some but for someone who watches these nest cams 100 miles from home, i feel they are very reliable and are a good pair of eyes to watch your house/backyard/neighborhood when you're away.
title: I have 2 of these, and 2 other nestcams - love it!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: slang106
content: I installed two of these. Overall, I am very pleased with the cameras; however I do think they could have better night vision. During the day or when there is a light on they are very clear. Unknown whether the Cam IQ cameras would have better night vision?
title: Great cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Chispas73
content: Love it, I can go to work and have the peace of mind that I can check up on my mom while I'm at work.  Very useful
title: great camera to keep an eye on children or elderly

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: GeeQ
content: Already bought the set but needed a 3rd one for my garage. They all worked perfectly but now I'll need to invest in a whole house wifi system since the one in the garage continuously keep loosing connection because the router is too far. Oh well, guess Best Buy's will be getting some more money from me pretty soon as I don't worry to shopping at Amazon anymore since they now charge taxes. With the Best Buy price match policy I'd much rather have it in hand when I'm ready to shop.
title: Needed a 3rd one

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Gbear
content: There has been alot of car robberies around us the last few months as well as people walking through our yard in the middle of the night (the neighbors dogs wake me up when they did thankfully) We have had the Nest Cam Outdoor installed for a week now and i love it. So far we have only seen a kid selling stuff for school fundraisers, a pesky neighborhood cat and the delivery man. The quality is outstanding day and night, sound is clear and the intercom like system works great. I would recommend this to everyone.
title: A Must Buy

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JD22
content: These are in addition to my other Nest cameras, clear and easy to mount.
title: Great Cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: IrishHammer
content: Forced me to update home network equipment to get them working reliably.
title: Works well

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: pmessana
content: We have the nest doorbell and google hub, these are a perfect companion.
title: Best Cameras Out There

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JamesZ
content: Very nice built quality camera. I'm amazed even by the product packaging details. Simple installation. Camera works 99% of the time except when the wifi signal connecting to the camera drops which is not the camera's fault. Although I had to install additional wifi extender to make sure camera stays connected. Web and phone UI is well designed. Push notifications to email and wear watch almost instantaneously. Very satisfy with my purchase.
title: Highly recommended

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: serialtoon
content: Ive only had this camera for a couple of days now but it works REALLY good! Install was too easy, to the point where i felt i might have missed a step but nope! All set. The only downside is you have to factor in the fact that you have to pay monthly for cloud recording otherwise you can still use it but it takes the security aspect out of it quite a bit. I wish it allowed local recording since i have a desktop capable enough to store months worth of video and what not. But if you are looking for a set it and forget it kind of situation, this is perfect. Looking to buy another one.
title: Excellent camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: perryfd
content: The Nest Cam is a great camera but you need to pay a monthly fee to unlock some features that should be free. I returned this and went with the Arlo Pro. No monthly fees for seven days of recording. Plus, I attached an external drive to automatically backup recordings.
title: Great Camera If You Pay the Monthly Fee

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Efteepee
content: I've had a pair of Bose QC15's for years, and have always loved them. I switched to an iPhone 7, and didn't want to deal with the 3.5mm adapter, so I bought these. The sound is about the same as the QC15's, but not having to deal with the wires is awesome. The battery lasts a long time too.
title: Great headphones. I'll buy the next model, too...

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Zack
content: Bought for my in-laws because we have one and they were totally jealous. So now they have one too and theyre super happy about it.
title: Great Christmas gift.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Salb
content: Nest in my opinion makes great cameras. I have 2 of these and two iq outdoor. I love my IQ. But I bought these on black friday for 8p dollars off. Love them.
title: Best cameras.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BenwickBears
content: We already had 3 nests at home and needed 2 more. These work great.
title: Perfect if you need two

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Ricky
content:
I know things are not always perfect, but when someone tries to break into your home and the camera doesn't detect the person's motion from 10-15ft in front of it, it's sad (for the cost and what's advertised).
When a camera doesn't detect or alert you for simple things, like a person going back and forth while cutting the lawn, its sad. Situations like this when it doesn't detect the people that aren't being sneaky (in my case, and the person that was sneaky) happens all too often smh.
Those are my experiences with this camera, to me it lacks, motion detection and alerts/notifications. I thought this would give me some kind of peace of mind, but not at all reliable enough to do so.
But I will say the video quality is excellent, even at night.
title: Unreliable

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Omakase
content: If you are paranoid about people stealing your rake, plant, tomato garden, ceramic pot, shoes or snow shovel like I am... well this is the right camera for you. It will capture that person as they try to use your garden gloves...and who wants to share garden gloves? Protect yourself folks and this camera can help. Big time.
title: Great for paranoid people

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Ruthabagah
content: Bought 2 of these to cover the front and back of my house. They work great with clear he vision during the day and not too grainy night vision. Install and config was a breeze, and they integrated seamlessly with my other nest products. My only grip: the service fee is too high for just recording video.
title: Another great nest product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SandS
content: We got these Black Friday and have been very pleased. They are very clear and we like them better than the ones we replaced. Nest products are great.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Milehighmayhem

Can get cheaper cameras but after paying to fix my truck, it is much cheaper to buy camera to monitor my property. Added motion light as well and have zero issues since.
title: Great camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: jyk228

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: 782Don

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Rockymama
content: This is a good camera with great quality however I wish we would have researched all of the possible choices out there before committing to this particular security camera as I wasn’t aware of the required monthly subscription in order to really get the full use out of this camera. Aside from that issue I have with the camera this is a quality camera quality HD video with subscription you can save your videos to your account and than to your phone as well, you can also zoom into certain areas of the video as well. The 2 way communication is quite flawed as it’s more like an Intercom system instead of being able to talk to one another over an uninterrupted line, I haven’t found much use for it since we usually are caught talking over one another when we do try to use that feature, but otherwise as a security camera it definitely serves its purpose. After purchasing 2 of these cameras, the ring camera & doing further research I just feel for the price you pay for the camera their fees are a bit more than their competitors.
title: Good camera but make sure to research your choices

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JILLL
content: I ended up exchanging this camera for a Ring Security light camera due to the fact that they could be installed in existing light locations. I didn’t know that this camera needed to have plugs nearby....therefore wires showing!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BobD
content: I would recommend this camera  to my friends and family

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Leatherrestore
content: The two way audio is sub par.  The help line indicated there way no way to change the inordinate low level preventing meaningful dialog.  The notification of activity has a long lag time.  The sensitivity is also not adjustable and a multitude of false notifications predominate.
title: No software for changing volume or sensitivity

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Court
content: Love that I have insight on what’s going on with house. The quality is very high and the cameras looks very modern so they aren’t an eye sore. I have the ring door bell as well and I like both equally but would say the nest is a bit higher quality.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: iToy
content: I purchased this outdoor camera and the Arlo Pro. Even though the Arlo Pro offers free 7 day motion recording, I find it slow to start recording and unreliable; I.e., it doesn't always recognize and record motion. This camera has a better viewing angle, has better video and picture quality. With a paid subscription, it can be set up to record continuously. Yes, I wish the subscription was cheaper or nonexistent or would let me record to my server but the only option available is using blueiris software. Again not ideal. Overall, I am very happy with this camera and would purchase it again over the Arlo Pro.
title: Excellent video and picture quality

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Nengrl

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

content: A Wi-Fi camera lets you monitor household activity while you’re away and can alert you to activity. For the latest update to this guide, we spent more than four months testing 14 indoor Wi-Fi home-security cameras—evaluating motion and sound sensitivity, smartphone alerts, speaker and microphone quality, app features, storage options

Great camera for outdoors. The night vision is really clear. We purchased this camera to check in on our dog when we are not home and it has been perfect. 

The only downside is that i get a lot of notifications and emails saying my camera spotted activity. These happen when a neighbor just turns a light on or when a bug flies across the camera and it gets annoying. My dog is kind of big so i get a lot of notifications saying it spotted a person when it's just my dog. I probably get about 25-30 false notifications a day but its still nice to check on the dog.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Greg

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Alsa
content: Great Camera.. Motion and person detection. As expected..I have another cheaper brand camera which fails miserably...The only issue is that it is wired and needs constant power source..But overall, very satisfied

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Schwa
content:
I am very disappointed with these cameras. If you want cheaper wireless cameras with better quality, get the Arlo ones. The Nest cameras look super grainy and they are laggy. 

The only real redeeming quality is they have a long power cord and you don’t have to worry about a battery dying.
title: There are much better options out there

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: supra
content: As long as you have good wifi, this item will give you top notch image/video quality. Can view from anywhere with the nest app. The reason didn't give it 5 stars was because if you want to be able to have more than 3hrs of recording storage you have to pay $9.99 a month to get 10 days. The camera is one of the more expensive ones out there, so kind of a bummer to pay that monthly fee (though it does offer a couple of features with that service). Other than the monthly fee, great quality camera so far.
title: Great image quality if you have great wifi

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BBUser
content: Love that we can watch our home when we are not there!  We live in a new construction are so it is nice to be able to keep an eye on activity around us.
title: Great camera for beginners!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: chell
content: We love the Nest camera system! We have one installed in the front of our home and the rear. Being able to receive alerts to our phones 24/7 each time the camera sees activity is very reassuring especially when we are not home!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Cosio
content: I bought this set for my house. And I showed some of my family the quality on my cell phone and they all liked it. My uncle purchased the two pack as well as my brother and my aunt bought the single indoor came and another aunt bought a single out door cam. This are awesome quality cameras. Everyone complains about the monthly fee. But I figured that I'd rather have a 24/7 recording rather than an alarm. So I love it and you will too

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Supp

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Klabo
content: I bought this camera not for security but to spy on a bird nest over my front door. It works great for that purpose and the birds aren't bothered by its presence. The nest is still busy so I haven't turned the camera to be able to see people at or approaching my door, but I imagine it will be nice to have that view as well. The picture is pretty clear though not, as expected, as good at night. It's possible that is due to the camera's proximity to the nest.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Joe115
content: This camera was so easy to install,once you find the location,only 2 screws to mount,I have a frame house,1 hole to drill & plug it in. Programing was a breeze,awesome picture.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: easy1
content:
I was having a lot of power tools stolen
n from a property that i'm remolding to flip. Thefts in excise of three thousand dollars . Got them thanks to nest I watched them on camera I called 911 the police showed up put them in cuffs and they are well on their way to prison

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Dora
content: Excelente product I recomendable                                    Every body love this product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

They say they are working on it but I have my doubts. Thank u!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

content:
I have an older analog, 4 camera system and I've added the Nest Outdoor to my front porch. The quality is much better than expected, the audio is very clear and the notifications are very good - no false positives.

My only complaint is the camera does a great job of identifying a "person", but you can't (at least yet) configure notifications just when a person is spotted. So, the majority of my notifications are from cats. I expect Google/Nest will improve these options in the future.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Sfccavazos
content: we are so happy with this product, is what we expect and more.
title: we really like thenest

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jeay

I found other reviews that said the same thing. So... I bought nest cam outdoor and it consistently worked through its app. No problems even after the free 30 day full service!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Daddy
content: finally received cameras during holidays and we are pleased.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Moose

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Moose3155

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MRSB

My husband and I can see all activity at the house and talk to unwanted solicitors when needed. You cannot go wrong with this camera! (We've now been running it for a year and have had zero problems)

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: bosshunt

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SKANN
content: Nest makes high quality camera. I can see the stream at pitch dark. The only con is their subscription service. They cost a lot in the long term. Given that storage costs are dead cheap they are charging customers at a premium. You should definitely think about that before purchase. As there is no point in keep the camera when there is no recording available. They got that and charging customers a premium price.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Disappointed

Had a good impression on the camera (though I think Google is a little too much in your face---this camera+video+monitoring seemed a little more intrusive than I was comfortable with)

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

content: Picture is amazing until you try to zoom in. You have to preselect a point and select zoom ahead of time to have a clear picture. $100 nest aware subscription is another downfall. product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: PNLe

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

content: We bought this camera in December and have had miserable support from Google.  The cameras arbitrarily drop our phones from the program, stop live filming, etc. and you can’t contact Google directly for help, you have to go through Facebook, and type your questions.  We are just about ready to pull this camera and go with another that has competent support.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

Using the DVR service through nest aware is incredibly expensive and it's a per camera subscription. I have 6 cameras... these aren't cheap cameras either. Other than that, I love the product.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

For the safety and security of me and my family,
Anything lest than this should be nothing compare to this

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JRSanchez

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kate
content:
I would give it zero stars if I could. 
23. That's the number of times our camera has gone out for 10-30minutes in the past three days. Google claims it's the internet. Yet I have ZERO issues with my Nest Hello Doorbell Cam. Zero. It has never went out the whole year we've had it (which is why we bought these cameras). We have a mesh router system and you get 150mg of download in every corner our our house, all the way to the street! Our internet isn't the problem. This overpriced piece of garbage that Google doesn't stand by is the problem. Waste of money. Will be getting different cameras through someone else.
title: Terrible

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Anon
content: Works well with fast Wi-Fi and a good signal. I'm giving it 4 stars because you really need cutting edge Wi-Fi speed to stream the 1080p image And the signal must be very strong. That and the subscription. But, since it is a subscription based service, the apps are up to date and work really well so that's a good thing I guess.
title: Overall I'm happy.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: pipipipipi
content:
So if you are going to stuff camera next to the routet, you might be fine.
But anything.less than perfect signal it will drop connection and take anywhere between 3hrs and 3 days (or never) to reconnect.
I tried 4 different extenders ( no that I needed them signal is just fine even without them) and nobhelo. Camera is too stupid to recconect itself to network of it drops connection from whatever reason.
So it is a software issue.
How do I know? For the sake of space let's say I do.
If you hard reset the router or extender camera will grab connection.
Even if you take everything 50 ft further.....

So generally nice product abandoned by NEST.
Whoever figures out how to get to their live support that is letters ( not ones that ask you if you turned on the power and have you tried rebooting, I need people that breathe code)....please let is know how to get them

My problem is im.too lazy to return it but I'm 5 minutes from it.... really

Firmware update folks. You screwed up something!!!!!!!! Camera should self reccin3ct to router if power is lost of WiFi is dropped from whatever reason

By the way nothing of my 159 devices is dropping connection but nest camera.

Also if powered down and up, all other devices come back and claim their up and connx except nest camera. Went through 2 sets of them and same....
title: eeeh... main selling point is not working

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mohamed
content: It’s a great product! Internet live streaming, very good night recording and alerts are just on time

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Wolf2112

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jason

The only down fall is one of the locations i installed the camera had poor wifi at times causing the camera to go out. That and accompanied with having to pay for service is kind of a bummer. Other then that i couldn't be happier with my nest.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Slaing625
content: I have purchased several Google products in the past couple of months. We had a Ring doorbell that was rock solid, and upon advice from a friend switched over to the Google/Nest line. So far it has been nothing but problems. One of our outdoor cameras keeps tripping the GFI, the other one I have not been able to get connected to the front of house, even after purchasing a WiFi range extender. My house is not very large. Our door lock, I have had to unscrew it from the door to do a factory reset.  Third party switches (WeMo) are constantly on the fritz. When things work, they are great - but when they go wrong, plan on a couple of hours to get them back online again.
title: Inconsistent

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: David
content:
Bought these cameras for of course home security. They worked great up until a few weeks ago when they wouldn't connect to Nest. Their tech support literally knows nothing. 

They tried to blame my network when nothing on my network has changed since the day I bought these cameras and they worked for 4months or so before they just quit. 

I tried everything from resetting the cameras, resetting my network. Unplugging the cameras for hours, bringing my laptop up into my attic to connect them directly to nest instead of using there app. Called my internet provider and they said nothing was being blocked from there side.

Anyways I tried for two weeks straight to get these to work and then all of a sudden two days they come back online. Without doing anything. I'm guessing it was a bug on their side that their "tech support" knew nothing of and their engineering department had to fix. Just a guess.

Anyways when they work they work great. I am however a little upset I didn't know they were making a new IQ Outdoor camera that supports 4k and Tracking and better night vision.
title: Great Camera when they work.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: TeslaPilot
content:
The Good: 
1- These are better than avarage at dismissing insect fly-bys.  The IR don't attract them as much.  
2- Night vision is OK. 
3- Zooming is FAIR- not good. 
4- Google integration WAS Fast.

The Bad: Where to start?
1- Google bought NEST. They decided to force all NEST users to switch to Google accounts. In the process, they just messed everything up.  They even corrupted accounts with gmail addresses.  My 2 home video hubs stopped recognizing the Nest devices, and will no longer accept them because my gmail account records became corrupted.
2-They recognize every car 100' out as movement. and keep hassling me. Funny thing, they will let cars slip by unnoticed through my 90' long driveway. USELESS.
3-In consideration of thieves everywhere, they've removed the capability to turn off the 'recording-on' led. 
4- These cameras are magnetically attached. You can swat them off their base with a long enough stick, and walk away with them... particularly when you can easily notice the LED they won't let  you turn off anymore. In their defence, I think they have a replacement program for stolen cameras. Not sure if it's still available
title: No longer working seamlessly with Google Home

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Fhdewitt

I will probably end up having to pay for the service so I can get value from the camera. The alternative cameras lack much in comparison so I would recommend if you want to monitor your home.
title: Great camera, service less than desirable

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: j92536
content:
Summary of my experience:

Pros:
- Clear image
- Reviewing camera history from anywhere
- Typically timely activity alerts

Cons: 
- Cameras (original and replacement) turn off or lose wifi connection frequently (4+ times a day), typically in 15 minute increments. My internet connection is not an issue - I have gigabit internet and have excellent wifi connection (~430 mbps on wifi) at the site of camera - measured on cell phone.

Per nest customer service, my first camera was overheating. Note that it was winter in TX and to my knowledge the camera was not being affected by any external heat sources (e.g. direct sunlight, hot air from attic). In the app settings it notes that 1080p recording may result in a warm camera. Did they mean overheating?

I'm having the same issues with my second camera. Waiting from customer service to get my third.

Cannot recommend this version of the product.
title: Don't expect consistent recording
