product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Nassim
content:
So having a Nest doorbell, I figure when I was looking for security cameras to keep it Nest brand so as to integrate seamlessly. I only really needed one camera, but at $199.00 for a single camera or $299.00 for two cameras, I went with the two pack as it was a better value. Now the cameras are very high quality and the set up is a piece of cake. Simply down load the Nest app and scan the bar code on the camera and Nest does the rest. Log on to you WiFi and  and your connected ….it was really easy and painless. Once you're connected figure out where you want to place your camera screw in the magnetic plate and attach the camera to it. The camera is held on by a pretty powerful magnet, which I was first skeptical of, but now have no worries as it has held up with no moving to some serious rain and wind storms. Then you plug the camera wire into the connection box which is then plugged in an electrical outlet. It is just that easy. My only gripe about the whole installation is the camera cable has a big connector on it where it plugs into the connection box. So basically to run this cable thorough a wall into your house which 99% of will have to do since the camera is outside and the plug that plugs into an electrical outlet will be somewhere in your home, you will have to drill a hole about the size of a quarter (7/16th I think ) into you wall! not the ideal thing to do, but a must. I drilled through the wood and then used caulking to fill the hole in, My hope is Nest makes a much smaller connection in the next generation camera. But as for installation that is my only complaint. 

Now on to the app and the use of the cameras. The Nest app works beautifully and opening the app reveals my doorbell camera view as well as my front yard camera view. Both in beautiful 1080 HD. When you connect the camera you get one month free of Nest's monitoring service called “Nest Aware” setting up the cameras resolution, night vision and most importantly the camera's notifications is easy. One awesome thing about the Nest cameras is they record 24/7! Ring and other cameras only record when the camera is triggered or the doorbell rung. These cameras record ALL the time which is awesome so you can scroll through the video and see what happened all day and night ...pretty sweet feature....Now, here is the not so good news about the Nest and it has nothing to do with the cameras its all about the Nest Aware service. After I set up my cameras and the sensitivity zones and  for what and when I wanted to be notified I was really happy that I could pick and choose the things that I wanted to be notified about such as a person, sound, car or a package left at the door and what I wanted my camera to notify me about. Because I want to know about someone in my yard not someone walking across the street in my neighbors yard or just a car passing by! The Nest camera allows you to do that and I was very impressed with the camera settings and abilities. But when my free month of Nest Aware expired I lost ALL those awesome abilities, no more picking my camera zones, no more 24 hours recordings etc....now my cameras would only alert me when someone came into the zone or rang the doorbell. So basically I was unable to control my camera's zone, so with Nest Aware I could pick when a person or something entered that zone to notify me. Without Nest Aware then I get notified anytime some is picked up on my camera...so since the field of view on the camera is quite large I'm getting notified when a person walks across the street and not just into my yard......ugh...what a pain!  Without the Nest Aware subscription the cameras still work and you don't need to pay a monthly fee to use your cameras, but you can't save or download video, nor can you really use the full potential of the cameras without paying for the Nest Aware service! Clearly Nest wants to force you to buy their monthly service to  fully access and use the cameras to their full potential.  Now to be fair Ring and most other camera providers are also doing the same thing. So me wanting all the bells a whistles decided to pay for the Nest Aware service as the cheapest plan is $6.00 a month or only $60.00 if you pay for the whole year up front (savings of $12.00 a year). So I paid for the whole year up front...now the real kicker, that $60.00 a year was just for my Nest doorbell. Now I have another camera to add to my Nest Aware subscription, should be no issue right? just add it and enjoy?  Oh no here is where Nest gets you, I can't add any cameras to my Nest Aware subscription without paying an additional camera fee . Nest must have realized upset their customers might react to this and at the least will charge only $3.00 per camera per month more....how sweet of them. 

So basically since I technically have 3 cameras, (1 doorbell camera and 2 outside cameras) for my monthly fee for the MINIMUM package to access all the feature is going to be $132.00 a year! If you have or want more cameras you're going to pay even more! So as for the cameras and doorbell the system is great and high quality, as for the Nest Aware subscription well lets say Nest is really taking it to their customers. If I already have a Nest Aware subscription I should be able to at least have 2 to 3 cameras on that subscription without being charged additional fees! Unfortunately Nest has taken a great system and turned it into a nickle and dime money maker for them. For me I now have a decision to make to either pay for one, two or three cameras. For some people the $132.00 a year is not much for others it maybe. I just wish I knew all this before buying the Nest system. So in a nutshell:

PROS: Great high quality cameras that are easy to set up, mount and use.

CONS: If you're going to get the Nest Aware subscription, which is highly recommended to get the full use of the camera system, be ready to pay! The more cameras you have added to your Nest Aware subscription, the more money Nest is gonna charge you!
title: The Cameras are excellent, service not so much!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: singlemom
content:
I did a ton of research before purchasing. I love the long cord that it comes with. I love the clarity of the pictures for the most part (night vision too blurry to read license plate/make of vehicle that egged my vehicle while driving past a week after installation). I love the alerts and app. Installation and set up was easy for the most part. 
I wish the app had a pause feature while previewing the footage. 
It is slightly annoying to get an alert every time a car drives past as I didn't realize that the camera would pick up the road (About 40 feet away?).  I have no outdoor plug-ins so I had to drill thru my brick house. That made me uneasy enough, but the cord that is required to go in your house or building, in order to prevent someone from just walking up and unplugging the camera, is about an inch in diameter.  So it had to be a BIG hole drilled. I think that could've been better designed. Had my dad not done that for me, I'm not sure I could've installed this camera without professional help. Now I have about 7 feet of cord raveled up and hanging out next to the huge hole in my wall that still needs made aesthetically pleasing. Not sure what to do with all that cord.  
Overall, I would buy it again as my complaints are small and more of personal preference. Other cameras are battery operated, live feed only, grainy video, very short wire/cord, or expensive subscription fees to counter the cheaper camera prices.  I think this is the best quality for price with the best features.
title: Great for Peace of mind

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kirknang
content:
We needed security for our home while we were away.
Bought other brands, but was never happy with the quality or function of the cameras until we finally found the nest. Perfect in every way!!
title: Wonderful camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: sameat
content:
My wife and I (together) watched her drive up the drive, unload the car and come into the house in "live" view.  About 30 seconds after it happened.  Meanwhile, my little home made ip camera system has a less than 1 second delay and the exact same image quality.

This was supposed to be an upgrade, but with the delay it was a significant downgrade.  I don't want to pay a premium to  watch a video of somebody breaking into my house while that person is standing next to me stabbing me.

I have the fastest residential internet I can reasonably buy from my isp.  Maybe it's still not fast enough at 200 mbps, but it has handled  everything else I throw at it just fine.
title: No good

Read the instructions online or use support

nest get a hint tho and allow custom clips from the cellular app

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: techbus
content:
This is an excellent camera in many ways. First, it is very easy to set up. It literally takes a couple of minutes to add a camera, after an account is set up. It takes only a few minutes to set up an account. The difficult part is the physical installation of the camera, as with any camera. This entirely depends on the structure, network range and power source. This applies to every camera in the industry. The Nest is still a wireless camera, and therefore no need to run an ethernet cable. 
Nest has made the installation very easy by including the hardware and instructions. Their customer support is excellent. They have an excellent app for iPhone, Android, and can connect from PC as well. One feature I really like is it sends a notification alert and an email by indicating "noticed some activity". If it sees a person, the notification changes to "spotted a person". BTW, it even records audio and you can have very clear conversation with the person, if you choose to do so. The video clip in the email shows a zoomed in picture of the person. You can then go to the video, clip it and save it. 
To view the video history, after free 30-day trial, you have to subscribe to their service at $10 per month, $5 each additional camera. You can also save by paying for the entire year (pay for 10 months, instead of 12). The Nest subscription is well worth it.
If you don't want to spend money on the subscription, no problem. You still get an activity notification, and still, can monitor live video. You just can't access video history and don't get "spotted a person" notification.
I have researched other cameras. I even bought a Samsung from Costco and ended up returning it, after wasting about 5 hours just to connect the Samsung camera to a network. I am glad I didn’t install the camera outside first. The app and instruction for the Samsung were terrible.
The Nest camera is the way to go. They have other Internet of Things (IOT) products, for wireless connections, including thermostat, etc. I have not used any of these myself, yet. They are truly professionals in the IOT industry. I highly recommend the Nest camera.
title: Excellent Security Camera in Many Ways

content: I did a lot of research before choosing the Nest Camera as a security and notification device. The setup was easy and fast. The quality is excellent. Many people may be hesitant to purchase this camera due to the $10 per month subscription fee. Don't be. The service offers constant recording for 7 days, very easy to use software, great app for your phone, and the person recognition is well worth the price. You can view the video from anywhere/anytime and don't need to worry about a dvr. The microphone and audio is a little delayed but work fine for the purpose. I do wish there were more options to limit the amount of notifications, but otherwise is an excellent product. Highly recommend.
title: Worth the $10 per month for service

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: madwacked
content: I started my wireless camera search a couple months ago and initially purchased The NetGear Arlo Pro system.....It looked amazing but ended up being expensive and disappointing......I has constant connectivity issues and I could only get 2 of the 4 cameras to operate at the same time so I returned it and purchased the above system. Well so far I'm in love with this system.....It is easy to set up, operate, has decent video quality and was cheaper!! I've had zero connectivity issues and just couldn't be happier......I do have to say I liked the batteryless feature of the NetGear cameras but then again nothing can compete with the raw power of an 120 volt electrical outlet........except a semi-smart thief who turns off the power so a backup power system is needed for all crucial operating systems (modem, router and cameras) and of course with wiring a person must plan a little better. So overall I give it 5 stars which isn't saying much except that it has met my expectations so far and would recommend this product for relatively easy and inexpensive video survellience.
title: Easy to use, setup and reliable........

author: Reviewer1971
content: Well made. Nice looking. But not practical. There is a large round piece in the middle of the wiring that is hard to hide. The camera is nice. The concept is nice. But to just plug it outdoors and leave it there for someone to unplug it and walk away with it is silly. The large round piece in the middle of the wire connections also means it's impossible to hide the wires along a trim or door edge or put inside a conduit. I returned mine after not being able to install it in a semi-decent looking way. It's an eye sore.

content:
I bought these cameras to monitor my property while I was out of the country. The cameras quit working 5 days into my trip. 
The internet went down for a short time and when it came back on, the cameras didn’t. My previous camera system always reconnected after an outage. For the price I paid, I expected this would not be a problem. Don’t buy these cameras if you’re looking for reliability and piece of mind.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: notforbeginner
content:
The cameras are good but install and speed are bad.

Install of each outside camera has to be done at the router. If something goes wrong you have to take it down and set it back up next to the router. Many error codes and overall messy install. If you change your internet router your have total each camera down and bring it to the router. 

Called tech support after two days of issues and this was the resolution.  Even though we have internet service in our entire yard and house the syncing of the camera needs to be done  close the router. 

I wish I had bought another system but had the nest thermostat so went with them.
title: set up is terrible

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BellasBuddy
content: Sure there are more expensive and better clarity outdoor security camera systems out there, but for me, the NEST Outdoor camera met my needs, proved to be a quick and easy self install and paid dividends first night after install, catching a burglary at a neighbors. Was able to use the screen and video grab features to send the homeowner evidence needed. Set up the remote smart device notifications so I am alerted when my camera sees activity or hears sound. All those features are adjustable and optional, so for what I consider a fair price I am in possession of a highly adjustable security system. Would recommend either linking to a recording device / hard drive or signing up for NEST Aware service.
title: Great Outdoor Camera for the Money

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MonIsa

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: GizmoGuru
content: Cameras worked great despite having to pay $150/yr to access your video footage. For some reason today full screen video and access to the nest aware subscription services stopped. Click on the camera image and nothing happens. No notice or alert from the Nest company. Support sight has no way to free form a question to get help. Not even an option to chat with or call an agent. Not worth the money for nest aware and not very useful without it. No recourse for the customer who's video mysteriously disappears and no full screen access. Not recommending nest cam unless there is a company response to issues like this.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Dloy

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Zamboni

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Tatha

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

I've complained to their customer support but there's never a solution for it. Google it and you'll see how common the issue is. I deeply regret having bought a set of cameras. Now I can't return it or use it. Huge financial loss. Be aware if you're planning to buy one.
title: Great, when it works

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: RPRPRP21
content: Seems like a great product, but I only have a CAT 5 wiring to my front door, and so I wasn't able to get it installed. I had a Nest professional installer look at it as well and he didn't know how to install it over CAT 5 wire.
title: Couldn't install it

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kma84
content: Returned this item. We were unable to install it because of wiring.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Synge32
content: This is so easy to remove or unplug. No reserve power either. The app is slow to respond. It is built well and looks great. Picture is great and the motion detection is top notch
title: Easy to tamper

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Conner
content: I love my Nest thermostat and protect unit, so I was excited to add the outdoor cams. My cameras probably disconnect 10x per day, and apparently this is a known issue. I wish I had done my research, there are a lot of people with this problem and Nest does not take responsibility for the issue. When they do work they are great, but reliability is key in a security system. Also, the install on these are a pain, and I do installs as part of my job. I hope you learn from my mistake and do not purchase this product.
title: Such A Disappointment

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SWTX
content: I purchased this camera to try it out, but the image quality was not good and also it had a lot of lag even when my internet speed is 150 mbps . I then uninstalled it and went back to bestbuy and switched it for the new version of it and I love it. No disappointments at all.
title: Good camera if you are on a budget.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: ElRod
content:
Pretty good camera system, however, be aware that it uses quite a bit of bandwidth. This can come into play quickly if you are limited by your internet provider on upload and download totals. (Such as CableOne)

In addition, the system only records, and stores up to the last 3 hours of activity unless you subscribe to "Nest Aware". Currently the price is around $150 per year (if paid on an annual basis) for one camera to store 30 days of activity. Additional cameras add to the cost of the service as well as bandwidth usage.
title: Fair system for the money

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kerr
content: I could not maintain consistent connectivity to my network.
title: Poor Connectivity

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: user1518
content:
What I like about this camera is that is really is easy to use, easy to install, and easy to maintain. I already have a few nest products at home so I don't have to create another account with another password and another application. This camera talks to each other so I don't have to check multiple apps to get updates of my home. The quality is really good, but only if you have strong wi-fi, so make sure you put your router close by your cameras to avoid any interruptions. 

What I don't like - while this is wireless in terms of streaming and internet connectivity. You still need to find a place to route the power cord. It does include a 25ft cable, but that really is not long enough if I want to put one in the back of the house and route the power cable on the inside.
title: Great home security camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: LivingLifeLarge
content: We were in search of a basic, smart outdoor security camera system that worked with our existing smart home products.  Since we are fans of the Nest products, quite naturally we choose Nest cameras.   The cameras work very well, provide a very clear picture, clear sound, has a voice feature where you can both talk and listen to someone outside, both live and recorded activity can be viewed on your smart devices, the night vision is also good and they hold up great in inclement weather.  The cameras come as a set which was great.  These cameras are an outstanding value which is why I say that they perform better than expected.   The only thing that I think that Nest could improve upon are the connection cords for the power source so that they can be less visible when mounted; however, their are creative things you can do to camouflage them (check out YouTube).  Love the product!
title: Better than Expected!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kokopely77
content: Amazing quality, easy to install, looks great and easy to use.
title: Great camera for home security

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SgtMajor
content: Very difficult to connect this camera with the cell phone app.  App won't recognise the camera.
title: Can't connect

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Chargerwoes
content: Older home. No electric outlets up by the roof eaves. Had to return for they sold me wrong cameras.
title: Needs plug outlets

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Techsavvy
content: The quality of the images is always great. For night vision just make sure it’s not next to a wall where it can reflect off.  That was a big difference.  I like the different price points you can choose and if ever there is a problem with the service they email me that I’ll get a credit.   Piece of mind when you are away from home or just wanting extra security. Easy install.  I didn’t even have to mount the camera because they have a magnetic back and can just attach to anything metal. Great purchase.
title: Better than Arlo

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: bart
content:
Nest makes a great product , easy to set up and easy to use.
pricin is very reasonable
title: great product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BigJ
content: Love how these work!  Video quality and resolution is better than any security camera I have owned.  There are some quirky features that I wish were a bit better designed.  The magnetic base that the camera secures to is actually more stable than I thought it would be but it also seems like it's vaulnerable to someone just knocking it down with a stick or something.  I also thing the power wallwart is rediculous it should be at the plug end with the wires securing to the camera with a small connection.  In one location I wanted to drill through the wall to access a plug on the inside of my garage but the hole would have had to have been 1/2" to get an 1/8" cord through and it's massive connector.  Instead I had to string it along the side of my house and the power pick in the middle of the cord is secured to the side of my house for all the world to see.  Very odd design.  The cameras once installed are fantastic though.  Very easy to connect to your WiFi network and easy to control and set up.
title: Security when I'm not around

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Dabasejumper
content: I had these cameras mounted and they just completely stopped working after just 1 month. Impossible to get a call back from Nest.
title: Buyers Beware

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mrmojorisin
content: Easy setup. Picture quality and ease of use within the Nest app is a breeze and very customizable.  Be sure to have your power source mapped out ahead of time.  I installed an outlet in my attic specifically for these cameras so I could run the wire up thru the soffit and not have to look at cabling.  Camera installation went like clockwork.
title: Work great

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Waqar
content:
I always wanted a security system but was always looking ways to save. Once you are nest eco system you will enjoy the ease of using and how easy it is to setup. Love these little but might cameras can do.
Worth every penny. Highly recommend
title: Great security features

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BStagg
content:
I’ve owned 5 different brands of security cameras over the years and these are the best I’ve had yet.  

The Pros:
-Continuous recording
-Image quality
-Ease of use
-App available on a variety of operating systems
-Accurate motion detection
-Connects with a wide variety of other home automation platforms and services.
-Strong connectivity and reliability
-Easy to mount

The Cons:
-Pricier than some
-Requires a subscription for some of the functions to work
-Googles poor reputation for privacy
-Not HomeKit compatible

I was hesitant to buy initially because of my concerns about what Google does with all the images and videos that are captured as these continuously record, but I needed a reliable, easy to use camera system that I could count on to give my wife and I peace of mind.  This system has delivered.  We had basically abandoned the old camera system because it had become so unreliable and that we have these up and running, we are able to keep an eye on deliveries, landscapers and our kids and pets when we’re away.  I’d recommend these to anyone looking for outdoor security cameras.  While they may cost a little more than some of the others, you definitely get what you pay for and I would say that these are a great value overall.
title: Best overall outdoor camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BellevilleResident316
content: ormance! After a bike was stolen out of a neighbor's garage, I decided to put up some cameras to keep an eye on my property. While these are not cheap, they are worth every penny. The quality of the materials and the ingenious design that includes magnetic mounts makes these cameras a great value. And the nest software is easy to use and also well designed. I am 100% satisfied with these cameras and highly recommend them.
title: Excellent Design, Easy Installation, Superior Perf

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Frankie
content:
to the point...
pricey camera, wish it was cheaper price, but great features, clear picture, night vision a plus, phone app a plus and no storage unit needed. You do have to pay a monthly fee per camera, wish it was per account instead. easy to install and set up. love the microphone and audio record feature, basically like a 2 way radio. would purchase again.
title: great security camera for diy persons

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Saffotizer
content: I have installed a variety of home security cameras and these are by far my favorite. They are super easy to setup and use. The picture quality is amazing and the app is very smooth. Being able to scroll through a live recorded history is the best thing about it. I upgraded my home from the arlo cameras to these and I couldn't be happier.
title: Best cameras for the money

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jammy
content: I own this cameras for a little bit now and this are the best cameras I own. you can control them from your phone, reposition them as they are magnetic, easy to put up, waterproof and very easy to use.
title: Love my Nest cameras!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: OsoGrande19
content: Really like these cameras.  I have 4 around the exterior of my house.  App is easy to use, the picture quality is good in daylight or evening.
title: Good quality, reliable security camera.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: TechGuy47
content:
So I have previously reviewed the single camera and found it to be very exceptional. I also purchased a twin back of cameras to install and like my opinion of the single cam, I am very happy with this purchase.

Pros: Exceptional camera quality. Built in speaker and microphone allow you to communicate with someone on camera. Set up was very simple. I did notice that if you are setting up with an Android phone, and you have something else connected to your phone's bluetooth, you will have to disconnect that device before your phone will complete the camera set up. In my case, my smartwatch had to be disconnected from my phone.

Cons: Cameras are a little on the pricey side. Also, the core on the power cord is very large. Had to drill a large hole in the wall to run camera cable. Also, cloud storage subscription could be a little cheaper, especially when you have purchased multiple cameras.

Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase.
title: Excellent Camera Exceeded My Expectations

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: WarpedTrekker
content: These cameras have a sharp image for being just 1080p. Pretty good image at night as well with the infrared night vision. Added several of these around the house for security and theft deterrent. People notifications work great, and they don't false trigger for other objects and bushes/trees moving. The app lets you set the notifications to only notify you when a person is walking around. Easy to add to my WiFi network, and comes with the hardware needed to mount to a wall. I drilled a hole inside my garage and mounted the camera outside, and ran the cable inside.
title: Excellent security cameras. Sharp image.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: mikdam
content: They have to make it clear that after first month you loose most features if you don't pay 10$ per month for each camera.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Sharon
content: Love this security camera. With the world the way it is everyone should own one or more of these cameras. Good price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MsElle
content: The Nest system is simple to set up and easy to use. The video is clear, even at night. We subscribe to their service for 10–day archives which is very reasonably priced
title: Nest is best

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: GolfPro
content: My kids have the Nest inside camera and like the easy setup, so decided to buy the outside camera rather than investing in a full security system. It was real easy to set up right out of the box and like that it works well with the other Nest products (smoke alarm and thermostat) that I have.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jerry
content: Great cameras the have a decent range of view. Very easy to install.  App is very user friendly.  You do have to pay for a service if you want the best features but only $12 a month so not bad.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mommy

The many features which are included are excellent the list is very long  and to have Google nest privacy makes this a great purchase choice. All Google nest cameras have a free 30 days trial include on each camera you install.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Game
content: Installation and setup was super easy. The instructions were spot on to follow and the Nest app is user friendly. The audio/video quality is superb, I really like how much range these cameras cover. I also like the fact that the camera can detect people, & will notify you to tell you that it detected what it thinks is a person. So cool! I will be purchasing several more of these.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Cinnstv

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Monochrome
content: Works as expected, and the mounting hardware is simple but effective. Only concern is if you have this mounted outside and a bird lands on it, it can move your whole screen and cause your zones to be misplaced. Still a great product however
title: Easy set up

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mamadee
content: Love this camera and it's features. I receive updates when the camera notices something. Being able to hear things and talk is a great tool. The app you download from the play store makes setting this camera up easy. Love the security it gives my family.
title: So easy to set up. Great camera and features

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: CKLIN
content:
Pro:
- Easy to install. You do need to figure out a way to provide power to the unit, which might be a challenge for some users depend on the placement of the unit. But this is much reliable than the battery operated camera. Which is the main reason why I choose this model.
- This Nest software is very well designed to offer timely notification of any activity detected. And this software also allow you to control other Nest product - Smoke detector, Thermostat, which the main reason I choose Nest brand, because I don't need to have so many different software for each type of devices.
- The camera store all video on google cloud, which mean you do not need to have another separate hardware (hard drive or computer) to store all the video, which over time will fail, and render the security camera useless.
- This unit uses your in house WiFi network to upload video to the google cloud, which is easier than hard-wire cable between cameras and a central recording device.
Con:
- Though the Nest software allow you to get activity notification send to you , define a area-of-interest to minimize false alarm and store all the video in Google cloud, but this would require that you subscribe to google's monthly plan, which is not a small amount if your budget is tight. If you can afford it, this is great, it could be a 5-star product. In my case, this is the main reason I rate it as 4-star.
title: A very well integrated security product.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mamcita
content: I did not read the reviews prior to purchasing so I did not realize that I would need to purchase the additional software subscription in order to utilize the full functionality of this security camera. Still have the camera but haven't installed it yet as I am seriously contemplating returning it. I gave it one star as the system required an input here but I really do not have an opinion about the product but am very disappointed about the additional software requirements.
title: Had I known....

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MidasTouch3
content: These are a must have for anyone serious about home security. Plenty of products are available in the marketplace, but either they require changing or recharging of the batteries. Having a wired connection and intuitive user interface in the app makes these cameras a no-brainer. Even adding the cameras to the system during setup is easy. Only downside is that these are a little pricey, but I caught them on-sale at best buy.
title: Excellent Camera System

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: mace
content: Our first camera failed within 7 days, customer service replaced it quickly. Cloud video storage servers were unstable and the storage price is too expensive, when app and server stability is less than 70% available.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Quickster2
content:
The camera is good quality but you have to pay a $10 monthly fee if you want to save any of your video or images 
Just another bill
This camera save only 3 hours of video and then deletes it

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: FlyDogStudio
content: OK, I looked at a load of reviews, checked out cameras installed by friends, and this one seemed to be the most versatile. The app on my phone is simple to use. It was very easy to configure, and there are more features to access if you log-in using a desktop computer (to configure the zones in the picture - movement in a designated part of the picture will trigger an alert to my phone). Also, you can record in 1080p, 720p or standard definition. Just remember, 1080p recording will require a pretty high broadband connection.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Elemental6401

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Lisaco
content: Our nest cameras work wonderfully to ensure our yard is secure. We have the optional affordable cloud service as well and have used the videos to send clips to law enforcement when items have gone missing from our yard. They increase our feeling of safety and work well.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

I have a remote cabin (well not that remote since there is internet .. it is slowwww internet) that has three of these monitoring the property plus a few trail cameras.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Nevaeh
content:

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NestCamReview
content:
These cameras are super user friendly. It honestly probably takes longer to get them out of the box than it does to actually get them set up. The image is super clear, I can have clear conversations with people through the camera (audio both ways), and I feel safer knowing that I am able to view my house throughout the day...mainly to check in on my dogs! 

If you do have issues setting it up then they do have a great support team that can get someone out to your house to assist. 

FYI - You'll have to purchase a subscription if you'd like to be able to have your camera footage saved to a cloud up to 30 days. I don't have the subscription currently, and I can only go back 3 HOURS to review the footage so that's the only negative I would say. They are expensive, but I'm not marking that as a con because I think the price is well worth it.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

title: Great value and price!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Shieyeng
content:
I ordered two but have only set up one so far on my garage to view my driveway and backyard deck. The camera captures an incredibly wide angle so just one camera was all I needed for the back. I can view the live stream or recent history on the Google Home app really easily. There are a few gaps in recording, which I think may be due to the camera's distance from my wifi router, but otherwise it functions and performs well. 

Three con's I don't like about this camera are 1) The 2-way communication is pretty much pointless on this camera because the camera speaker is incredibly quiet, even at max volume; 2) Without Google's Nest Secure, I receive a lot of unnecessary notifications about the camera detecting movement, which is likely because I can't set specific zones for detection notification (only available to those with Nest Secure); and 3) The concept of how the cabling should be for a "security camera" is silly--the cabling is designed to be shown completely outside and connect to an outdoor outlet. I drilled a 1-inch hole in my garage to filter the cable into my garage outlet. I needed the 1-inch hole to fit the USB lock that secures the cable to the power adapter and will be using something to fill up the space surrounding the hole.
title: Nice Camera - Decent "set up"

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MarkGTX
content: We were looking for a Wifi camera for our house and saw the sale on the Google Nest cameras. They were easy to set up and worked right out of the box. We were able to start watching the problem area of our house the same day we bought the camera.
title: Great Product for a great price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SmartPurchase
content: This product was easy to install and I was able to purchase it when the price dropped. However, the camera seems to go offline a little too often for me. Not sure if the WIFI is too far away or if it is the camera. I will continue to troubleshoot but as of right now I enjoy this product.
title: Decent

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: burstboy
content: Nest cams are great, easy to setup, and the app is very intuitive.  The only downside is with the video being wireless they can only be set up so far from your wireless router.
title: Great product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: TCLA
content:
The camera was easy to set up and integrates nicely with the rest of our smart home products. I have two complaints:

1. Google decided last year that the light showing the camera is active cannot be turned off. I have my camera installed in window pointing to the street and it's glaringly obvious that there is a camera. I'd rather it not be obvious. (I know that privacy folks argue it should be obvious that there's a camera.)
2. The plug is comprised of two cords that connect to each other. It seems that the two cords come unattached rather easily.
title: Good camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Khristian
content:
I originally wanted these cameras because I own everything else made by Google and Nest, and I wanted to reduce the number of apps to control my smart house. I have fiber internet with a mesh network powered by Google Wifi, and I have at least 6 Nest Connect around the house to ensure that everything works properly. My home is less than 1600 sqft and everything I have is set to cover at least twice that size. 

The camera App and Experience is amazing, set-up and installation are easy and very pleasant. BUT, unfortunately, this is not a reliable security camera. If you are looking for casual security, maybe a camera to watch your dogs in the backyard, good quality video to do something else that is not serious security, I can recommend. But if you want reliability and a camera you can trust at all times, this is not it. The Wi-Fi drops at least 6-9 times per day, it comes back up in less than 6-7 minutes and some times less than 20. But the reason I decided to write the review today is that just a few hours ago, someone stole something from my front yard and I saw them through the window. It was nothing very valuable, it was a decoration and I am not a confrontational person at all. So I thought I had it all on camera. It turns out that just before the person arrived till like 2 minutes before the person left the camera decided to disconnect. We never know at what moment of our day we would need our camera to be working, and 2-5 mins 7-6 times per day may not seem much for most. It sure was enough to miss the yard thief today. 

AGAIN. It is a great product, it is good-looking, the app experience is great and installation is easy. Overall the quality of the product itself is SOLID. I also have an overkill Wi-FI set up to ensure I never lose signal at all times. So it could be a faulty set, but for now, until I can see if I can get a replacement. My suggestion is not to get this camera if you are serious about a 24/7 uninterrupted monitoring. 

And I want to point out. I am not a product Karen. I understand disconnections happen, wifi signal could be weak sometimes, and that maybe Wi-Fi is not a great security option overall. But when a product missed close to 2 hours per day when you have done everything and more to ensure it does not happen. It is not a good enough product for me. Or anyone who would like security at all.
title: Good cameras, but a few flaws.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bob1
content: Nest cameras are very easy to configure with a smart phone. The outdoor cameras have a small disk a little larger than a quarter that can be mounted with 2 screws, then there is a "puck" that attaches by magnet to the disc and the camera attaches to the puck by magnet. The magnet is very strong and the camera should be held securely, although someone could grab it and rip it off the house or building. The supplied cable is very long (25ft or so) however it comes in 2 pieces, both of which must be used and the connector at the 10 ft mark is very big thus requiring a large hole (I think I used a 7/8" bit but you may be able to go a little smaller) to be drilled to get the cable inside the house if that is how you are going to plug it in.
title: Great Camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SoCalSteve
content: I purchased two more camera to cover the rest of my home.  Already owning two this product provides quality picture, sound and cloud recording via Nest/Google.  A must have for homes having packages delivered too.  The camera two pack is also a great value in price too!  Very easy to set-up and operate.
title: Quality Nest Surveillance Cameras for my Home!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Surge
content: It can be set up easy and nest aware price is better now.
title: Very cool system

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jarlaxle40
content: As long as there is a convenient plug-in near where you want to install this camera, it works very well, has good sensitivity - almost too good, I had to work to find a position where it didn't capture part of my street and get records of every car passing by.  The magnet base is relatively easy to install.  The picture quality is as good as I need it to be, and works well so far in day and night conditions.
title: Very good, easy to use

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: KCutler
content: Easy to setup and operate. The quality of materials used surpassed any similar priced packages... And Google makes it so simple.
title: Love this system!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: daltstatt
content: Easy to install. Good images. The only reasoning for a 4 star is the online pricing for recording. Love the feature but I think the pricing coins be lower.
title: Great camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mgomes22
content: I previously had an ADT Camera system, however it only recorded video clips in 30 second intervals with a 5 minute gap between videos. As a result, when I had a package stolen from my doorstep, the camera missed the main parts of that were needed to identify the thief. I looked into various camera and purchased two nest cameras, the monthly fee is $15 for 24 hour videos for a 7 day period which is cheaper than my ADT fees. The camera quality is great along with the features and automatic notifications, however the notification may reach your phone after the mailman has already left. Not a big lag, however there is a lag. Installation was easy, just had to buy a new drill to go through the exterior wall of the house. Note you may need to increase the speed of your internet for high quality video streaming.
title: Slight Notification Lag but works well

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MaureenAL
content: It is fairly easy to install. The cord that runs from the camera to the USB that connects to the electrical cord is not very long, which limits where the camera can be placed. The camera is very sensitive to motion. It notifies us of motion when a moth flies by at night. (Tip: don't place the camera near an exterior light!) It notifies us of motion during the day when a bird files by the camera. Nest should modify the software to only send notifications when when the motion event is greater then 2 seconds, so that just humans walking in to and out of the range of the camera are logged as a motion event.
title: Good security camer

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Artie
content:
I purchased an Arlo 2 system for the inside of the house. And was completely dissatisfied. Cameras have to constantly be rebooted due to them being disconnected from the hub. The hub freezes which makes all the cameras obsolete until I come home and reboot the hub.

Verizon FiOs gave me the nest doorbell and I loved it. It’s been almost 2 years with out issue. Then it came to install cameras outside of my home I code to try out the nest. And I completely love it. It’s simplicity, smoothness, and no complications. I love it so much that I have 5 of these cameras. 

With the new nest aware subscription, these cameras are even better due to that I don’t need a new subscription for each camera.
title: Best WiFi Camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Disco
content:
So these work great, what I find annoying is the complaints due to the price of the aware service. Does anyone do research before you buy? Or do you just buy things and then write negative reviews because you didn't do your research.....get a clue people, they aren't hiding the subscription service for cloud storage.....with that said they work wonderfully. If you are a CCTV expert or have access to a multi thousand dollar system go for it. If not these are a great way to go for your average homeowner.

I would have loved for the power cord to be a smaller diameter but it is what it is. Mounting is easy hooking them up is easy and getting them up and running is as easy as 123.

Picture is great and the interface on the app is great. I would have loved to be able to set zones from the app but maybe in future updates. 

Anyway for the price you can't beat them AND IF YOU DONT WANT TO PAY THE MONTHLY SERVICE FOR STORAGE DONT BUY THEM.......DUH.
title: Work great

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Elevated303
content: I love these cameras, they are extremely affordable and easy to set up/use. I will def purchase more!
title: Easy to set up and use

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: RPCB4
content: 1080p resolution certainly put this camera at the top of the home, wireless security camera game. If you plan on perching this camera up to 10'-15', having 1080p resolution is critical to catching and recording fine detail, that of a security camera. The notifications that are sent to your phone or email are very helpful, giving you comfort knowing when people are coming and going from your property. Installation was simple and timeless.If you plan to buy, I would recommend a wi-fi extender if you have other wireless devices in the house. This unit did seem to take an extra amount of wi-fi connectivity to sync. If you have spotty wi-fi, this camera is very susceptible to dropping out with connection and thus becoming useless to your security needs. After we purchased an extender, we haven't experienced any issues.
title: Reliable and comforting

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: CptnMalReynolds
content: It deserves the 5 stars on overall design, performance and setup alone but the standard USB connector they use to connect the camera to the power cord is way too large and the only minor issue I see. It's watertight and the all around design and performance couldn't really be better for the price IMO with that one exception. The connector, should you want to mount it outside with little to no wire showing needs to be put through a hole into the interior of your home for power, etc. So, with knowing that, the smallest hole you could possibly make is 3/4" - quite large for a low voltage USB cable. But I went ahead and did it anyway, sealed around it and it's been excellent. It's about 50ft from my router through 3 interior walls and a metal garage door and I've had no connection issues on a 2.4ghz wifi connection.
title: All around excellent with one minor design 'flaw'

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Alimo
content: I have to say that it was easy to set up both cameras via my home Wi-Fi. The barcode on each camera makes it easy to set up and the video quality is outstanding. I love the fact that both cameras have speakers so you can hear and talk to whoever comes to your house. I wish the speaker was louder though because I could barely hear it when I was testing it especially if you live in a moderately noisy community. The other down side is the $10 per month if you want your videos saved in the cloud and have ability to play back. Without subscription you only get 3hrs of recording playback and I believe you don't get "person" notification. Make sure you have power source close by or else you might have to drill holes through walls. Overall the nest system works for me and serves my needs. I just want to see who is at my front and back doors and the ability to communicate with the person in real time.
title: Good security cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: j3jonas
content: These cameras are great and I was lucky enough to catch them on sale. I bought a 2-pack for $238. Installation is super easy and convenient. The camera lens and 1080p resolution looks really good, along with the night vision. My only issue is the software and convenience of sharing your camera. I want all of my cameras in one location, but to share one, I have to share all. A better permission system is my request - then I would give it 5 stars. I'm still happy with the product though.
title: Great Cameras and Price!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: TechishinSanJose
content: Happy with our purchase, with minor caveats (in addition to hefty price tag). Here's my take. Resolution of video is excellent. Magnet base enables you to adjust the camera angle, but not very much. Setting up the wifi connection for the camera, including scanning the tiny bar code, is much easier if done before installation, but that's not abundantly clear (or maybe I didn't look closely enough before handing the box to the electrician). Keep in mind you'll be spending additional money for an electrician unless outside power source is handy. All in all -- so far, anyway, after a week -- we are glad to have these cameras.
title: Overall, a good product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: 2hotty
content: Love that the cams record 24/7 so you can go back and see footage and save clips. Footage is fairly clear at middle setting in the app. Only negative is the merger with google makes accessing the app a pain when having to sign back into the app. Setup was a breeze, mounts included work well.
title: Would recommend

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: ChrisHouseStark
content:
I am very impressed with this camera. 
Highs:
Extremely easy to setup and mount. 
Very clear 1080 resolution
Able to listen and speak through camera.
Great app. Notifications are great and playback of video is also great.

Con:
Without the nest subscription, the camera is extremely limited to real lime viewing and only viewing clips for past 3 hours. You must get the subscription to get all the features of this camera. 
Subscription is expensive. But I'd rather spend the money on real time alerts and monitoring than pay for an alarm service with central monitoring
title: Surpassed my expectations

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bane
content: My collection of nets products was growing so I thought I would add the nets outdoor camera to it. Installation was fairly simple, with some drilling required. Setup, as always with nest, was super simple. The only issue I ran into was connectivity to my home network. This device is very susceptible to losing connection. And unfortunately I had to return the device.
title: Great camera, poor connectivity

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: joecool82
content: I've been waiting for Nest to make an outdoor camera for a long time and it was worth the wait. Excellent quality, beautiful design, and easy to install. Watch out when installing, I could not find the wall plate in the box and even returned to the store where 5 employees opened up another package and no one could find it. It was magnetically attached to the back of another piece and the sticker identifying it was on the wrong side - so if you don't know to look for it attached to something else you'll be wondering where it is.
title: Easy install, high quality security camera.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Ceparano
content: This camara is great, quality, easy of installation and easy of use. The app makes it simple to view past and live footage. It doesn't hurt that it intergrates with the nest thermostats. The only downside which is minor I guess is that I had to drill a sizable whole into my exterior wall to pass the wire through. I wanted a more secure set up so I elected to run the cable inside but because the connector is a bit large I had to drill a large whole. Either way I think this camera is the best option out there.
title: Great camera and easy to set up.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Rayd2018
content: My wife and I started down the road with NEST Products. We decided to add additional cameras after researching all the products NEST stood out as the ones for us. They are easy to install and produce a great picture. I would recommend the NEST products to anyone looking for a security system.
title: Great product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Galnn7497
content: Great security camera, decent price for a pair.  Great video resolution too. You'll need to be a little handy or hire someone for a clean cable managed install.
title: Great security camera, decent price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BC151RULES
content: These cameras were a great addition to our security system.  The Nest systems works great and is easy to set up!
title: Awesome Surveillance

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: GBNJ
content: Purchased the Nest because it had many of the features i was looking for in a security camera. I particularly wanted a 1080 quality picture with the ability to receive notifications via my phone. I already had a NEST thermostat so this purchase was an easy addition. My one complaint is that the USB plug is too large, it is 5/8" in diameter. It can not be detached from the camera unless you cut the cable and splice it back together. In the end I had to make a large hole to feed the cable into, much larger than I would have like into brick. Other than that installation was easy and the instructions where easy to follow.
title: A little pricey but a good camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JimB
content: Great security cameras but even better when you combine them with a Nest Aware monthly or annual subscription. Got these because we've had several instances of theft in my neighborhood. These send timely notifications to my phone and include very easy to see screen captures of what was happening. The notifications can easily be customized to fit your needs.
title: Great security cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mollie
content: We wanted a camera for outside.  The camera system delivered.  It was easy to install and the pictures are great.  We watched a car pull up and take one of our signs out of our yard last night.  We have also watched a racoon  walk across the driveway.
title: Camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Numbbee
content: I installed this camera about a month ago and it has been working better than expected. The night optics are superior and the motion/sound sensors are very sensitive and notifies me any time there is noise or motion. It even picked up a stray cat that wandered around in the middle of the night!! It was pretty easy to install. The only drawback would be the AC cord that needs to be connected but once you have a power source, then it works great. Highly recommend this camera.
title: Great overall security camera!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Falconator
content: My first experience with a surveillance camera and I’m impressed. Is very well built. The set up is very well explained and simple. The video quality is very good and there are plenty of options at your disposal. I did see an uncanny resemblance to Apple products here but that’s not a bad thing at all.
title: Excellent

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JC8999
content: The Nest Cam 2 pack is so easy to install and provides extensive coverage of the driveway, garage and side yard. I can see and hear anything the camera detects. Great night vision feature as well. Super easy to install and great for seeing what’s going on when you aren’t around.
title: Nest Cam is awesome

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jes14
content:
We tried these out and loved the features. Easy to talk back & forth, good quality video. 2 issues.... 1) the hardwire makes it difficult to install and connect to power in the right places outside our house. We were going to need an electrician 2) it’s expensive to buy plus you need to pay the monthly service. 

We ended up returning and we’re going a different route.
title: Super cool features, pretty pricey

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: OneKiowa
content: Great price and nice to be able to talk to unknown visitors without opening the door or when we are not home! The two-way communication works well and we can even check on our pets and talk to them...
title: Great purchase and great price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Raton1971
content: Easy to install, clear view and affordable. I purchased two and absolutely love the product!
title: Great product!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: AJCrown
content: I purchased the 2 pack and they are very easy to install. Wireless setup took a couple tries but that could have been due to distance from wifi router. Install took about an hour but was fairly easy. Camera video quality is great and software is easy to use.
title: Great Quality

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Lids1982
content: I bought these because I was tired of wireless cameras becoming de synced with their station. The installation was a breeze, and Nests app is easy to use, it’s a win/win
title: Easy to manage

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: DonS
content: Great cameras, easy install and very intuitive interface. I now have 4 cams around the outside of my house.
title: super easy install

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NFankhouser
content: This security system works great. It has put us at ease when away on an extended leave from home as well wa when receiving packages. Not hard to install.
title: Great system

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Pacdaddy
content: Good camera, easy to mount and setup. It is not as good as the outdoor IQ camera. That lens is better and has a clearer picture.
title: Good camera for the money

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JCandTiffany
content: Got these on Black Friday. Great price and the quality is really good. The user interface is intuitive and works very well right out of the box. Highly recommend.
title: Good image quality

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: dodgeramin
content: These cameras have a good picture and easy to use Nest software. My only complaint so far is the two way talk. There is no volume control and the volume on the camera is extremely low. You have to be practically standing directly under them to hear the other person speaking. I use an android phone and I have read blogs this could be the issue but I'm not 100% sold in that yet. Other than that I like being able to keep a watch on my property with these cameras.
title: Good picture

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Techmania
content: I was lucky to grab this set of two cameras when they were on sale not long ago. I wanted to install something as we were about to leave on a trip and it would just give us peace of mind to be able to see whats going on around the house. I have one camera not far from the router (wireless internet) and another one way on the other side of the house covering the back yard. Both cameras have not ever had trouble staying connected. Installation took some planning. I wanted the cameras to be high enough people could not reach them and they would not be seen easily. Connecting the cameras to power is what took the most planning. Determining a location that the camera can be mounted outside and the power ran inside the house and down to an outlet. If you want a very clean set up, plan to have some skills at running wires, possibly some drywall repair skills and again a good plan so that you don't end up with a pile of cord near the outlet. You will need a Nest subscription of you want the cameras to work to their full potential. I don't mind the extra cost as Nest has introduced new plans over the last year which are less expensive and adding more cameras to the same plan gives you the best bang for your buck. I like the idea of having something plugged in so that I am not ever worried about battery life. I plan to buy one more camera soon to have one other angle of the front yard. The cameras have been holding up to the weather just fine. I am sure I could write a book on what I like about these cameras and might only have one or two negative things to say. I hope you have the same experience if you decide to take a chance and give them a try.
title: Best deal out there when on sale

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: TheReviewerGuy
content:
I had the Ring spotlight camera, whilst it worked for the most part, it missed a LOT of stuff; it also did not record 24/7.  WiFi was awful on the ring as well.  Swapped it out and got this nest. 

I am very pleased but the notifications are decades behind ring.  It send a notification if a car rides by, sun creates a shadow, or if a bug flies by.  This results in thousands of false alarms.   Disable motion detection and have person notifications on and it should resolve the issue. 

Regardless, the quality of the video and 24/7 recording makes up for the shortfalls. You will need a very good router and a speedy uplink.  I’m running 4 IQ cameras, two ring pro doorbells and two regular nest outdoor cameras.  All cameras are set to the Max quality  With no issues.  I’m on a 400/25 connection.
title: Good cameras, easy setup. Poor notifications.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Zulea
content:
The cameras were easy to setup. The app made it very easy to view the live or saved footage. Scrolling back and forth in time was a breeze.
Once the 30 day free trial for their cloud service was over the video storage of past motion detection events was gone. The camera saved a picture instead. (Which I knew would happen) The picture, most of the time had nothing in it that made the motion detection think there was something there. The price to pay each month just to see the shadows on my lawn change or an occasional deer walk by was too much. The cameras also drop offline multiple times a day. I read a lot about interference from odd things on your network or in your home causing this problem. i wasn't looking to dig into all the items in my house to find if there was one doing this or if it was really just the cams dropping.
title: Nest Cams service prices are tough to swallow

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: AAPLfanBBY
content: Picture quality: fantastic. Motion activation: check. Night vision mode: crisp and clear. History review: fair. Setting up any and all parameters: so easy (I use my iPad Air for all Nest product setup). Shortcomings: too long screws for most applications really, and must plan out the cable; could be tricky bc of length as well as the connecting piece. It's otherwise pretty close to perfect for price and promise.
title: Awesome. Period.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: cleaner
content: With price not considered I would opt for the Nest Cam Outdoor IQ for better image quality and better night time visibility. However, these will do the trick at a significantly lower price point.
title: Easy Setup, Reasonable Price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: LFredri
content:
This was so easy to set up, and it offers flexibility to add more cameras if needed.  It joined together with my Google Nest, so controls for my house are all in one spot. 
I get notifications on my Apple watch and can watch videos from there after having subscribed to Google Aware.  Otherwise, pictures of what is seen are offered.
title: Great camera and easy to set up

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Den80
content:
Camera field of vision is great. Cloud backup works awesome and it integrated with Google Home. 

App setup is a breeze.

Camera is very sensitive to movement so if you live on a busy street it'll ping your phone a lot. 

Power cable is nice and long but be advised if you don't have external power outlets with a lockbox on your house, you're going to have to do some drilling and cutting to run the wires into your house. 

Still a little expensive compared to other systems. A wireless Nest would be nice (like the Arlo system).
title: Overall a solid product.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BrunoM
content: Purchased a 2-pack and won't stop there. Images, sound, and wide-angle coverage are exceptional. The human detection algorithm is surpringly accurate. Autumn leaves are bringing activity alerts, but machine-learning is reducing these. The apps' still thumbnail / event cueing feature makes sifting through such events a breeze. Day/night transition is smooth. This is a great tool for "timelapse" dawn-to-dusk videography. The NEST app is simple and convenient for smartphone and iPhone users alike. Consider it highly recommended!
title: Stunning 24/7 Surveillance

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Solo
content:
These cameras are great. Very easy to set up, excellent picture quality.
Very easy to use, the app is very easy to set up on your phone to view the cameras from anywhere. I can view my cameras and adjust my Nest thermostat using 1 simple app. Highly recommended! Looking to add more cameras soon.
title: great cameras!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: mtnovice
content: Easy installation and set up.  Should keep the riff raff from stealing toilet paper
title: Secure again

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jjcc
content: Video is nice looking. App is easy to use. Only complaint is the two way communication is not great. The speaker on the camera is not loud at all. Kids and dogs cannot hear you when you talk thru the camera.
title: Easy setup/great app

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: 2boysforme
content: I have been very happy with this camera. Quality is great. Coverage is great. Easy to install. Makes me feel safe home or away!  I did have to purchase an internet booster for better signal but works great!
title: Happy with the camera !

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: mikey
content: I am very happy with the security camera. It gives me new visibility where previously I had none.
title: New camera working great

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Nickname
content: Cameras are good and were pretty easy to install but the issue I have is with the built in WiFi is not as strong as I need it to be to get the signal. The price was good and I have been using the trial subscription but get notifications when I have set it to not notify if outside the zone setup. Not sure if I will keep the subscription but will definitely keep the cameras.
title: Slow connectivity

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bushy
content: Camera is great. Updates on app can be finicky at times but it’s usually updated quite regularly to fix issues. Clear video at day. Night vision could be better. Good for the price.
title: Easy set up.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Happyguy
content: Nice setup.. great combined with a few others to give you piece of mind
title: Easy to use

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: nunyabuzzness
content: I picked one of these up and have been quite satisfied with the results. Pretty easy install; with nice video clip playback. I did find that sun's unique reflection on my glass patio table tripped the motion sensor on one occasion (not a big deal). At this time i've not moved it outside yet (cabling challenges with exterior wall). Only disappointment is the cost of 10 day or monthly monitoring fee for the possibility of me wanting 4+ cameras (some alternatives are much less). I do recommend looking on web for third part mounting options (mostly for indoor models) - some are very unique and creative!
title: A nice alternative to a security system

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NestFan
content: I have various Nest products and this is my first outdoor camera. The picture comes through very clear even with my low speed satellite internet. I love the fact that it continuously records so I don't miss any action. Installation was simple (I'm female and was able to install myself), however the cord is visible and what I consider the only drawback. I am waiting to see how the camera performs with the extreme Arizona summer temperatures.
title: Great outdoor camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Patt
content: This camera is great for added security, image quality is really good easy to set up, and tells you when someone is walking by.. have some issues when you are connected to a different wifi on your phone (friend's house wifi) so I just don't connect and use my phone wireless data.. but when I'm home it has no problem with my wifi... Overall a great buy and worth the peace of mind.
title: Awesome Camera gets the job done

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: 007Harry
content: This is a great little security camera. Excellent images and clarity. Easy to install and connect. Offers wide angle view of rear deck. Has "zones" of special interest to monitor which you can identify . . . and notifies you via text or e-mail each time it observes activity . . . then allows you to go directly to that point in time to review. Also enables you to make short clips to share. Timeline is marked with color dots to indicate activity.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Chad

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: joemosch

We already had a nest thermostat so we decided to stick with the Nest Camera. Easy set up and installation. We have it facing our back patio. It took a little tweaking to get the sensitivity just right, we were getting a lot of "false motion" when it would see the fan of the air conditioner start to spin.
It survived Hurricane Irma and allowed us to see what was happening outside while we were safe inside.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

I subscribed to the 10 day package and although it is a little pricey, for me it is worth the peace of mind knowing the video is there if I need it.

content:
PROS: super simple setup, easy installation if you have the right environment for it, excellent picture quality, app is user friendly. 

CONS: Difficult installation if don't have good location near an outside plug that can be locked. Seems very easy to steal so I actually installed mine indoors looking out a window. Works great during daytime but at night the picture is distorted. There is no sensitivity adjustment so I get notifications any time a car drives by or a bug crawls across the window.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Yellowpebble
content: The cameras are very nice. Great picture.  Easy installation.  Love that it continuously records with the nest aware subscription. Having trouble with lag and the cameras going offline. I think it’s our new modem and router combo. Still troubleshooting the issue.  But overall great camera. I’m hoping once the network issue is fixed, I would love them even more.
