product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: judyb
content: This camera is a absolute godsend. These were very easy to install. Plenty of cord 25 feet to find a plug. Pairing to your phone was a snap. Within a week of putting these up, we had a guy try to steal our grill. I was able to talk right through the system and to his surprise as he looked up at the camera and gave me a great face shot, stop him from taking the grill and left him speechless. The great thing is that I was able to replay the video, get the entire clip downloaded and get it sent over to the police to catch this guy. With nest you have continuous recording and clip shots not just a clip with nothing else. The audio is very good. There is a slight delay but it is minor. The camera can distinguish a person vs motion and you can really set it to what you want. The only reason not giving 5 stars is that when replaying the video back for the police dept we cannot hear what I said to him. The police would have liked to hear my voice of what i said to this guy. I liked them so much that I bought another set for another area. Saved my personal belongings, Can save yours too.
title: Saved the grill!!!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Stallion20
content:
Got this camera expecting it to be complicated but was pleasantly surprised at how easy the sweet up is within the nest app. Integrates really well with my existing next thermostat. 

I really like the notifications that pop up as well with the clips of what the activity was that the camera spotted. Great home security camera.
title: Great home camera with easy set up

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

author: JackFrost

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JohnK
content:
Overall the setup of the Nest Cam was pretty easy.  

First plug it in, inside your home to establish the WiFi connection.  

I then took it outside on an extension cord from my garage to make sure the mounting location gave me the view I wanted before mounting the metal plate to the wall.

Then came the biggest challenge, routing the wire into the attic over my garage through the soffit.  The place where I wanted to enter was blocked by a 2x6 supporting the roof, so I had to run the wire about 20" the get around this.  This was actually the only part of the installation that didn't go smoothly.

Once I had the wiring run into the attic and plugged back into the outlet there I fastened the wiring in place at three locations along the run and all was done. 

Very happy with how easy this went up and the clear picture it gives me of the cars in my driveway and the front of our house, since our neighborhood has had several vehicle break-ins recently.
title: Easy Setup - Clear Picture

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: dakotas
content: We had been looking for a camera security system for 3 years. When I came into Best Buy and talked to the girl there that had one I was impressed. We bought it and I must say very easy to install easy to use and monitors my yard great. I feel safe having this system.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Sammy
content:
We bought these last month to replace a pair of TP-Link Kasa Cameras. Those worked well but not for our use case.

We went with these cameras over getting more IQ Outdoor Cameras (we own two) for the following reasons:

*  Around half the price.

* We didn't need as good as quality or zoom as the IQ cams provide.

* We would easily be able to hide the wire/tuck it in nicely where we installed them.

*We don't care for nor use the IQ features on our IQ cams.

Since these replaced the TP-Link Kasa Cams, it's nice being able to view my four cameras through one app.

We have one camera placed to watch the walk way to our front door and the door itself. The other we have placed to watch the walk way to our gate leading to the backyard. The image quality of these cameras are adequate for these two places. I don't think I'd be happy with them for the front (where we have the IQ cams).
title: Great cameras, not so great mounts.

author: Lynck76
content: This is a great camera, with great lens and video resolution (HD). It is very easy to install and configure. The app is also very easy to use and notifications work very well (you can even get notifications in your Apple Watch including a small screen shot). My only complain is that the $10 monthly service to store 10 days of video and get enhanced notifications is a little to much. Maybe $5 would make more sense to me comparing to what I pay for other cloud services.
title: Monthly service a little expensive

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: aprest
content: I bought the package containing two cameras. To my delight I discovered that the voltage and current needed to use them is 5v/1.4a which means that you don't necessarily need to use the 15 foot cable that has a USB adapter at one end and an AC plug at the other end. Since I only needed to go less than 10 feet to power the cameras I was able to use a simple 5v/1.4a USB to AC wall charger. The more expensive IQ version of the camera requires 15 volts to operate it and thus I would have had to use the 25 foot cable. The only issue that I found was that the male USB plug at the end of the 10 foot hardwired cable is a little unique and doesn't quite fit into some USB to AC wall chargers. However, I found that I have a bunch of wall chargers that work fine including the Abosi wall chargers which can be bought online. The wall chargers that come with Samsung tablets also work fine. But the USB male plug doesn't fit into my Leviton Duple USB Charger/Tamper Resistant AC Outlets.
title: Great Outdoor Cameras With Good Price for a Pair

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MzAmazing4000

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Christa

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Tomas
content:
I use these as baby monitors and as security cameras. I love the rewind feature so I can see when my kid went to sleep and The quality of sleep she had during the night.
Once my kids get older I will graduate these to be exterior security cameras. 
The only thing I don't like, which isn't a big deal, is that when you talk through the camera, though the person hears you, the recording doesent record your voice, you only hear the person on camera. So when you look back at your history if you spoke with someone over the camera your only going to get one side of the conversation. Maybe they will address this in a software update soon!

title: Super easy setup - works great

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: satxbiker
content:
I have tried one other outdoor camera (Guardzilla) before I tried the Nest. I went with the other one first because it was completely wireless and I would not need to run a battery cable. However, I soon discovered the picture quality and motion detection ability was not good at all.

I now have the Nest installed and I can say the following.
1. Excellent length in camera cord.
2. Excellent picture quality
3. Great motion/person detection - you get emails anytime it sees any motion and can tell the difference between motion (trees blowing or a moth) and a person. The email subject tells you which type it saw.

You do have to pay 100 a year or 10 a month to get the clips of motion saved off, but I feel it is worth the cost. If you get additional cameras the cost is half of that for each additional camera. I plan on getting a second camera to cover my driveway.
title: Great camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: franks
content: Overall I am very happy with the camera itself, great field of view, like you get 30sec video clips without having Nest aware, not just picture clips like other cameras. There is a slight delay in the nest cameras/doorbells that I don't like. I have a very good wifi network and there is a 5-15sec delay even when I am home for me to receive notifications. Typically the UPS person is already back down the side walk before I am notified someone is there. Installation was more difficult than need be due to this usb connector that plugs into a power block halfway through the power cord. Which makes you have to drill a 3/4 hole vs being able to drill a smaller hole to get the power into the house where you plug it in. Luckily for me I was installing this over my garage entry and was able to drill the hole in between a small gap in the garage door headers, then run the power cable along the ceiling of the garage with the provided clips into a plug in the ceiling. Otherwise I may have chosen a different manufacturer/brand. Overall very happy with the view and the option to not have to pay for cloud service to see things that happen/have happened.
title: power cord bad, camera good

author: NoVa

I also like that I can go back and review what activated the camara throughout the day or night. It has great view in both day and night time. The night view is more limited especially when it’s pitch dark the further out to determine a face but the camara will pick up a person or a vehicle moving at a good distance to alert you. product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: scott69z
content: I read tons of reviews on every camera system I could find before I purchased this setup. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. We've been using this system for about a month and a half now with no issues. The install and setup was relatively easy, but I did have an electrician come out and install a plug in my attic, so I could hide all of the wiring. This also will keep anyone from being able to unplug the cameras. The down side to this was having to drill a 7/8" hole under the eaves of my house, but I was able to make a very nice plug for the hole with a 7/8 dowel with a notch for the wire, which totally sealed up the hole. We really like the app, the ability to view from our phones, and the ability to customize our settings and notifications with the Nest Aware subscription ($150 a year for 2 cameras).
title: Great camera system

author: Shrek
content: I have other nest indoor cameras and thermostats so using the app to set these up and get them running before I went outside was a snap.  I found that the install screws were not the best for hardy board in one of my locations so you might need to check what you are attached the base mounts to.  I just spent more time trying to get all the wiring to look "nice" but it is a lot of wire and my outlets to my cameras were very close.  Might be a nice option if they had available wires for different lengths.  Kind of also disappointing for this and the Indoor cams the the power is still a small 5V USB brick.  You won't see that on the photo on the box so its not just a cord to AC, there is an adapter in the middle with another cord.   if you are a long way from an outlet you will have plenty of cord and a small 5V USB brick somewhere in the middle.  while the look is not quite Pro, the cameras work well and are doing the job I needed them to do.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Gamer
content:
I love almost everything about these cameras. Just a few thoughts...

Pros:
-Picture quality is excellent, in fact I dialed it back to medium (720p) just to save on bandwidth.
-Easy to install and set up, you'll be recording in minutes.
-Nest app is well designed, minimalist but very useful for monitoring your recordings.

Cons:
-Night vision has a very limited distance. Really needs to be mounted right next to a door or other point of concern, quality deteriorates from great to barely passable beyond 15 feet or so.
-Power cable is awkwardly designed. Even if you're planning on plugging in outside, there is a large round power brick that needs to be mounted in a rather obvious location.
-Huge amount of bandwidth usage, be sure your internet provider has unlimited data and sufficient upload/download speeds.

Definitely worth the purchase, I would buy them again!
title: Almost Perfect

content:
I had a lot of back and forth between these and the newer model but I can say this is the best option for most. 

Note the newer version is a lot larger and oddly is designed for outside while these work indoors and outdoors. 

They are very easy to set up and other than needing to figure out how to run your wires it couldn’t be easier. 

My only suggestion is to ensure you have very high speed Internet via a wireless connection. I personally use 3 Google Hubs wired using a merge at plug and that drastically boosts the Wifi speeds so it allows me to run both cameras and the doorbell on high.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NBC3
content: This is a great addition to the Nest line of cameras that allows you to easily add surveillance to any property. The camera requires a subscription which will set you back and additional $100 for your first home's camera and $50 for each thereafter that will give you 10 days worth of recording (who needs more than that?). The camera itself is solid in construction and is a breeze in its operation but the instillation is a bit of a problem. Connecting it to your app is just as easy as it is for the indoor cameras (very easy) but the physical install is not ideal. The cords are cumbersome in their length and you'll need a professional to get it to look clean and not be set up such that it is easy to steal (though, if someone does steal it, you'll have a remote server storing the video of their theft). Just keep that in mind, you will possibly need a $250 electrician job to make this look ''clean'', in addition to the annual cost.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Randimon2020
content: We love these new outside Nest cameras. The day pics have great color showing so much more detail than I expected! At night the infra-red lights up my whole back yard up and is super clear. I also put one above my front door facing across the yard, which allows me to get a clear pic of anyone at my front door or anywhere in my front yard. The install was easy and only took about a half hour to install each unit. The biggest problem was finding and planning for a 120volt access. There was plenty of cable that came with the kit for install. In my case, too much cable, which I had to figure out where to hide it out of sight. I have to admit I've become a Nest Junky. I start with the CO2/smoke detectors and moved on to a Nest third gen. Thermostat and then a couple in door cams and lastly the outside cameras. I love how the different items communicate with each other and us to make it an even better/safer product. It's also great that you can control everything from ur cell phone. The cameras can actually tell the difference between other things moving and if a person has been seen. Then it texts and emails you to go to app/site and see who. I think they have great products and even better people on the phone if you need any help or questions answered.
title: Great cameras with good clear pics

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Elpee
content: I already home two indoor Nests cameras, so I knew the outdoor camera would be just as excellent quality as my other cameras. It was easy to install, and adheres amazingly well to the side of my house which faces away from my deck. I can see the entire backyard. The voice over the microphone is just as powerful as the indoor cameras. I view the camera from my bedroom when I want to check to see if it is raining outside before I leave the house or check my lawn furniture and yard accessories during storms and high winds. I can watch my backyard from work to make sure my puppy does not find a way to get out of the yard. And of course, I purchased the camera for safety reasons. Sometimes my two dogs bark late at night warning me of strange sounds…strange to them. It may be a wild animal they hear or perhaps someone walking in the yard. Since I know better than to shrug off their warning, I simply check my Nest account from my iPhone to see what's up. It is a relief to have the capability to check my backyard late at night in the dark without having to actually open my back door.
title: Love It

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: neio11
content:
I loved this camera and I wish I could have kept it. I just couldn't bare drilling a hole through my wall and pay $10/month (not really that big of a deal but for the moment I had to go with something that solve more of my needs for the time being. Don't count me out yet Nest!)

Pros:
24/7 continuous video recording up to 30 days with subscription to Nest Aware. You get a timeline with markers and thumbnails of events to make it easy to find what matters. You can watch a whole day video in minutes with the time-lapse feature.
You can set multiple motion detection zones and you can set each of them a notification setting. The zones are color coded on the timeline making it very easy to review alerts. That timeline scrubber feature is my favorite feature.
On iOS, you get an animated gif like alerts. I don't know if it's the same on the Android.

Cons:
Subscription = $10/month then $5/month per additional camera (probably worth it for the 24/7 video recording. Ring is only $3/mo but only records when there is an alert. Arlo is too complicated to mention)
It mounts on magnetically so it is easy to knock out of place.
If you don't have an outdoor outlet available, you have to drill a 7/8” hole through your wall for the power cord.
title: Awesome camera!

Notifications are good but could be improved since they're is a slight delay from from noticing the person in the camera to receive it on your phone. Resolution and picture quality is good. If you're looking for cameras with remote capabilities and no DVR I would recommend these. That's if you don't mind paying the subscription fee to use the advanced features and remote storage (which is a must for this camera system). Otherwise you're just getting still pictures and not be able to review past footage. Also a good wireless router with strong signal is recommended if you have multiple devices connected and also high bandwidth for your internet connection.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jarold35
content: I have owned different surveillance cameras and I wanted to give it a try after reading some "great" reviews for this camera. It isn't worth it, at least for outdoors. What kind of security camera mounts on a magnet!? Thieves can just walk away with them. Constant wifi signal drop was turning me crazy! I have FIOS and the router was no more than 25 feet away and everytime I wanted to check my property there was an issue. Nest app went crazy after adding these cameras. I owned a Yale Lock and the app was just working fine before adding the cameras. Sooo many times, after installing the camera, I had to login over and over and over again. Finally, I made the bad decision of migrating my Nest account to Google :( The app went out of control and started getting constant email notification about wifi dropping, electrical issues, camera disconnected. Wow, I was able to return them, get my money and buy something else way cheaper that I don't have to pay a crazy subscription to be able to store footage of recent events. Bye, Nest Cams!
title: They are just overpriced

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: spark
content:
I was in need of some security cameras due to some activity in our area. I purchased the Nest 2 pack and had both cameras up and running within an hour of getting back home with them. The video feed comes in via a app on my phone and or a PC/ MAC and both the picture and sound quality is perfect. As an extra bonus I found that there was an app for the Newest Apple TV which allows me to watch on the big screen and easily scroll to points of interest by double tapping the touchpad on the remote. This makes for a fast recap of captured activities. There is an option to communicate in app or on PC/MAC but I find that it is delayed so much that it's hard to communicate as the person usually walks away before they hear your talking to them. Also while you're talking it kills the sound so you can't hear them either. This is Not a deal breaker since I didn't buy it to communicate but if this is something you would need you may want to check into something else. 
** I must say that I have a 150 mb up and 150 mb down internet connection so your results may be different.
title: Great quality / Easy to Install

author: ssf7189
content:
I have 2 Nest cameras already. I have the old DropCam for the inside and the Nest Outdoor camera which I recently bought and installed. I can say I'm really happy with these cameras. It's easy to setup, with crisp pictures, and configurations are practical enough. Sometimes, having too many options in the settings can make it too complicated for an average user. 

The only challenge I had with the setup is when it comes to the camera cable with a large cover head for the USB end which I think is almost 1 inch thick. I was hoping I could simply drill a small hole so the wiring is not visible. Since the location where I wanted to hook it up is against a concrete, I didn't bother as drilling a large hole may damage my wall. I end up simply wrapping the cabling around the edges of the garage door frame. It still ended up nicely but I'm hoping for future models to may be have an option where you can re-attach the covering for the USB from the other end. This will provide other users for a much better and cleaner installation.

But other than the USB thing, everything is working out fine for me. I can view all my alerts from my smart phone and the video is coming out clear.

If they correct the issue with the cable, I may purchase another one in the future.
title: Reliable Product but with room for improvements

content: We purchased the camera for our second home in the fall of 2016. There are plenty of settings you can control in the main control panel, we have chosen to leave the camera very sensitive...this means it does notice bugs and spiders at night and sometimes shadows on a windy day. It is amazing technology! Set up was a breeze and our concerns about connectivity and possibly reconnecting when we're away - unfounded. The camera has worked seamlessly. We love it so much we added the thermostat!

author: weirdpooh
content: I just installed and paired three cameras. The quality of the product exceeded my expections. Pairing to my existing WiFi went flawlessly. The fit and finish of the camera is outstanding and it blends fairly well with my house. I did purchase the colored skins to help the blending. If you are a DIY person, be sure to plan the installation. I brought the power wires inside, which required some holes in my house and some mounting blocks. The quality of the picture is outstanding and the live streaming as well as the alerts is very good. For home use, the 10 day loop is all that's needed. I also like the motion and sound alerts. The app is easy to use on my iPhone and iPad. All in all, this product and its support has exceeded my expectations.

The only thing I only have a problem with is the online recording service pricing. It is a little high, which hindered me from giving this product a perfect score. I have the nest ring and the online recording and it’s much cheaper. I chose this over the ring outdoor because it looks a lot nicer and has better resolution.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: UBNHacked
content:
I decided to wait to post my review after my 30-day free trial was over.
OK! Here is my downfall about this camera.
You have to pay yearly $100 for a 10-day recording or $300 for 30-day recording history. If you don't pay for the subscription. 
You will still get the alert notification on your phone or email account, but you’re not able to see any of the history.
You’re able to log into your account and watch a LIVE stream on the camera "only" and that's it...
I will say about the alert notifications 99% emails were 3-5 minutes delay. Not one was accurate timing.
So for another words your $199 nest camera turned into $299 after your 30 day free trail + plus any additional $100 a year for renewal subscription.
Nest does give you a 50% discount if you have any additional cameras added to your subscription.
One valuable lesson I did learned - the Nest Cam has a Home/Away Assistance feature. This feature lets the device know when you’re away or at home.
This will automatically turn on the camera or off the camera. But, it doesn't record while your home. I set this feature on my setting not realizing every time I came home. It turns off the nest camera from recording. My wife and I had are vehicles broken into when the device was turn off. Due to the Home/Away Assistance. Nothing was being recorded when 5 total strangers were going through our vehicles. (FYI - The suspects wear apprehended) I removed this feature ASAP.
For $199 I've seen better cameras that do the same thing, even rotate and record 1080p on a micro-usb. With "NO" $100 annual subscription fees.
title: NEST Cam - Rip Off

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

author: MarioChaser
content:
This is a great 1080p camera for short distance viewing outside such as a front porch, back porch or driveway. It is also apart of the nest ecosystem so you get all of your cameras in the same app along with the thermostat and nest protect.

There only cons are the Nest aware subscription and the distance viewing quality. I have a decently long backyard and the image quality does not hold up well after about 60 feet. I lose site of my dogs if they run down to the lake in my backyard. Now that the Nest IQ outdoor is available, I will be upgrading soon for those 4k long distance images. Otherwise, great camera for the price!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bradleybro
content:
Nest makes the install, setup, and use so that the average consumer can do it without being a Techie. Packaging is up there with Apple. Installation parts are ample and high quality. Excellent image quality @ 3mp -1080p. The high resolution is needed due to it has a wide angel lense @130 dregrees so you can se imageges farther out. Digital zoom is ok but blurry at high zoom. Nest Aware gives you 30 days playback for free fire the first 30 days. 
The downfall. After 30 days nest aware is $10 month for 1st camera and $5 for each additional. That's one of the most expensive I've seen on the market. Nest does not allow 3rd party apps to record either. Nest needs to take note to what the other players are doing and adjust or they will be left out in the cold. Some third party players are finding the back door to Nest so I can't wait to use a their software on my Nest Cam. Otherwise a great camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Guinness41
content: The Nest Cam works for what I got it for which was to see outside to view my porch and driveway. Camera works really well and very easy setup. I didn't have a plug for outside where I placed the camera so I added a socket to my outdoor light bulb that is in an enclosure. My main con with the camera is that the way the camera is designed you can't hide the cord and is easy for someone to go up there and cut the cord. The camera only connects to the celling through a magnetic mount so can also be pulled down and cut. I've installed security cameras in the past and also worked in law enforcement and I've seen cameras being pulled down and ripped off. That is why when you see security cameras the wire usually goes into the wall from the back of the camera so that there is nothing showing. So far I've had no problems and it is working well.

author: twelton
content:
I put off installing this for a week after it arrived because I was dreading having to route the power cord through the garage wall. The only down side to this is that the hole needed to be 7/8" in diameter to get the plug through. Not the end of the world, but drilling it took a while!

Was totally worth it in the end! The camera records great video and knows how to detect people vs. other motion. The app is very intuitive and quick to navigate to events. Events show up on my smart watch zoomed into whatever caused the motion alert. The app and camera are very configurable - it's a polished product that a lot of thought has gone into, and they got it right.

author: DrKPax
content: I purchased the two pack exterior nest cams. There is a magnetic holder for the cameras allowing easy adjustment. I took the extra time to run the power cords behind exterior walls. I've already told several of my coworkers and showed off the app. I truly think this is an excellent exterior camera that seamlessly fits well with my nest thermostat, smoke detectors and interior nest cam. product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Chaz
content:
The image off of this camera is amazing and it looks great, too! There are rubber skins available that allow you to change the color as well as protect the camera a little. Set-up of the camera and the Nest app were ridiculously easy, but the installation took a bit as I wanted a clean install. The power cord is basically in two pieces, and where they join together is much, much larger than the cable diameter. So, if you want to pass the cable through an opening (in a wall or roof) then you have to cut a pretty big hole.
Also, the subscription is a bit ridiculous. $10/month per camera, otherwise you only get a three-hour, low fps recording, which does not serve its purpose for most owners.
title: Great Resolution and App

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: ANELLO
content: This camera was recommended by a friend. Loved how it worked and the clarity of the pictures. I live in a 55+ community and quite a few have followed suit. After comparing different systems this was the best choice for our needs. Their customer service is excellent, was missing a part and they sent it out the same day.
title: GREAT CAMERA, EASY SET UP

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Erock
content: So when I purchased this camera I was looking forward to having added surveillance on the outside of my new home in the city. Thanks to this camera I have caught not once but multiple possible bike, Amazon grocery and package thieves! I love the live motion alerts, the real time video feed and DVR time lapse features! I highly recommend this camera over other competitors out there. I now have two cameras and have plans for future cameras on my other houses.
title: This is genius!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Imdwane
content:
This is not a $1000 camera, but for the money I would put this up against any camera out there. It takes 5 minutes to set it up and you're done. You can have e-mail alearts sent to your text or email in a flash. It has a record feature and can be use for two way communication. The night vision is crystal clear as well. Works with all nest products so there is one place to go for your cameras and thermostats. It won't replace my home camera system but I needed an extra camera in my garage That wouldn't be temperature sensitive and this was it.
Dwane cochenour
title: Inexpensive way to put a camera anywhere

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SweetestGuy
content: This is probably the best camera I have experienced for outdoor use. It’s strong, reliable, and easy to use! ❤️
title: Love this camera!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Petek
content: These cameras work perfectly and were easy to set up with our Google hub. Clearly shows what's going on in the areas they cover
title: Works perfectly

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: PNFG
content: These are great cameras. We did not want to go through the process of setting up a wired security system. We used the eero mesh network system which paired nicely with these cameras. Excellent quality and picture.
title: Easy to use

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mm21704
content: This is an awesome camera system and so easy to install. Put both of them up in about an hour. Great picture and though you have to pay a minimal monthly fee it’s well worth it. No locsl storage so thieves cannot steal that to cover their identity. Got a great deal for 3 cameras for $238.
title: So easy for peace of mind

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MikerBuffalo
content: Both camera's were easy to setup and use.  Software is adaptable for use on my laptop and phone.
title: Easy setup.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Meredee
content: I have used next products for many years but this is the first time I purchased outdoor cameras. We use these for security and they work well. Only downside is that you have to pay additional monthly subscription fee if you want it to save recordings.
title: Excellent Security Cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Murmree
content: I love these cameras.  They are so easy to install, no drilling holes and no special mounts.  Everything you need is included except the screwdriver needed for the screws.  Great picture day or night.
title: Great outside cameras.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: BusaRider
content: It just as good as the indoor Nest Cam. The picture quality is great. I have it mounted over my garage and I can see clear across the cul-de-sac. Night vision is about 20ft but if there is a light source in the area it be further. Setup is the same as the Nest Cam which is real easy. It comes with a 25ft power cord. Definitely would recommend this camera.
title: Great Cam

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NesQuik
content: Easy to set up and the picture is clear and crisp. Paired with my nest doorbell I'm happy.
title: Its good

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: WVUfan
content: Great product, install with ease. Worth the purchase.
title: Worth the purchase

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: gnargnarbinx
content: Tachnical set up is a breeze. Image quality is great but also seems to disconnect from wifi off and on (that might be our internets fault).  Still need to drill holes in house and wire it through the garage though.  That might be more difficult than a wireless camera.
title: Easy to step-up, install takes a little experience

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Ricco007
content: Nest products perform and last as one would expect from premium priced devices. This camera comes with everything necessary to install in an elegant way. The setup is a breeze and the picture quality in any weather, night or day is very clear. The field of view from the peak of our garage is almost 160 degrees (guess) and can be set to see and hear whats going on in its parameter. I have 4 nest products and all are well engineered and reliable.
title: Always Clear

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: HouseofBUNS
content: This is a pretty basic to use camera for monitoring needs. Set up is easy, and the picture quality is great. I love that you can zoom in, too. The free replay is great for the promotional period, and it's only $5 a month to maintain a five day video record that can be reviewed. All in all, a great item.
title: Easy to Setup and Use

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Ziggy
content: This camera is very easy to setup and install. Just follow all the directions on the app!
title: Nest Camera review

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: StCroixDrew
content: We have had a lot of cameras and simple security over the last few years.. These units are fantastic and worth every dollar. The clarity, zooming ability, motion detection and user simplicity... makes this one of the best we have had. It took me literally 3 minutes to install AND setup. No issues as of yet...And thinking we probably wont. Worth IT!!
title: Just awesome

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Evel19
content: I had to add a camera to my back yard, quality its great and easy to add to my Nest\Home.
title: I added to my yard

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jfrogersiv
content: Picture quality is great and setup and installation  is easy
title: Amazing quality

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Rosymanci09
content: I love my nest camera the quality is great. I feel so much better
title: Great security camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kenny
content: I now have three nest camera and they are very easy to setup and use from the Apple app.
title: Pricey but worth it

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SDC88
content: Love being able to open my camera and see whats going on at the house when I'm not home,
title: Great security

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jcz08
content: Very easy to install not many parts to worry about.  Good quality picture / video. I gave it a three star rating due to the subscription. If you need one camera or two this will work for you.  When  you have five or six cameras it can get expensive with the subscription and the purchase of the cameras. They need to have a more affordable plan for those who have more then two cameras. It cost $50 / year for your first camera and any additional cameras cost $30/ year. This plan is only for five days video playback. It gets more expensive if you want thirty days video playback. In the long period of time your subscription will be very expensive. There are other video surveillance cameras that have good quality video and no subscription but installing them can be a pain. If you don’t mind putting in the work go with a a more affordable and no subscription system.
title: Good quality video but expensive

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Kelly
content: Great cameras easy to use with movement clips. I recommend this product.
title: nest cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Stptechie
content:
I bought these cameras to keep an eye on my backyard and garage.  They were easy to setup and the picture is amazing.
We have the indoor version and love being able to keep an eye on our house when we are away.  I recommend this product to anyone.
title: Great camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Brian89
content: I was using Arlo cameras before this but they only recorded activity for a few seconds when motion was detected. They also weren't the best at detecting motion past 10ft or coming from the front, even at a slight angle. I had a tire slashed in my driveway, with an Arlo cam mounted 15ft away (over my garage door). The Nest cam has been the perfect solution. Now, i get audio and video recordings to easily cycle back through 24/7 and flawless motion detection, even beyond my driveway.
title: Best security camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Carrie
content: Easy to install -only thing one must know is you need to have an outdoor outlet!
title: Nest Outdoor Cam

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Brandon
content: The Nest outdoor camera is a DIY alternative with great picture quality. Setup is easy but installation is a little challenging as the unit has a large inline transformer and a fixed length cord...and of course it’s either to short or to long. Nest Aware is FAR to expensive.
title: Quality for a price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JJ44
content: Someone had suggested that I get these for extra security around the house. So much better than the adt hd camera they installed and was so easy to setup. My wife wants to get 2 more soon. You can even talk into the camera and here a response. It’s delayed a little bit but still great. Cheap for the monthly fee as well.
title: Best Buy for the proce

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jasper8
content: Very satisfied with the purchase. The quality is excellent and it is easy to install. Yes, I recommend this product.
title: Great cameras!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: KRThomas59
content: This is my 4th Nest Camera, we have 3 at our business for indoor use and this one is in the alley behind my house. Nest cameras are easy to install and connect to your wifi network using your smart phone. This one comes with a very long power cord to reach your power source. You can save clips easily, on line or on the app. I've even used a clip to send a burglar to jail (the guy looked right at the camera and kept on walking away with my tools, the prosecutor LOVED the video!!)
title: Great, easy to install camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jenn
content: These cameras are a great value.  Picture is good.  We’ll buy a couple mores to get all sides of our home.
title: Great camera for the price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bdoran
content: Sounds and look great. Glad to own. Now give me my points.
title: Great security.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: And000w
content: Great solid camera, very easy to install, bought this one to add to my current set, wide angle lens allows me to see almost 180 degrees. Highly recommend this camera.
title: Easy to install

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Rocko
content: Love these nest cameras! Great value! Easy installation! Includes all hardware needed to install! Great value
title: Superior

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: LT4951
content: Electrician installed due to the height camera needed be installed at, but it was no problem since it was close to a power source. Do not forget to set the camera up completely before hanging it. The unique code only printed on the back of the camera is needed for set up. Mine was hung by electrician before set up so I had to have him come back out to climb high to do set up by holding my phone close to camera as well as getting unique code off back.
title: Great outdoor security camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Jeff327
content: Nest cameras cost more but they are worth it. I have had problems with Ring and Kuna cameras. I would only go with Nest from now on.
title: Worth the cost

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: nestcam
content: Great camera.  Clear picture quality and easy to install.
title: Good camera and easy set up

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: ELHandyman
content: It does exactly what it promises, we built a new home and wanted some extra security, the Nest Cam has been the perfect solution for us. The video quality is outstanding, especially at night, and the sensitivity to motion is incredible , a moth flying by sets it off. We have more than 15 smart home devices installed in our new home and the nest and nest cam by far have been the most reliable for connectivity and delivering on their promises. Extremely easy to set up, works as advertised, my experience has been exceptional!
title: Best Tech purchase in a while

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Cooltool
content: This is a great little outdoor camera. If you already have Nest products, this one will be very easy to setup and add to your Nest family of devices. The most difficult part of setting up an outdoor camera is power unless you already have external power options for your home. Otherwise you may have to get a little creative running the cable to an internal source. Quality is excellent. Clarity is amazing too.
title: Excellent Outdoor Camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Brittney
content: Would recommend to family and friends! It was easy to set up and has a clear view of everything outside.
title: Great camera and easy to set up!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: roger821
content: I have a Nest Thermostat and 2 Nest Protects, so I know that Nest makes quality devices. The Nest Outdoor Camera is the same thing. Easy to configure, easy to install, powerful 1080p video, it's a winner. However, there's two issues here. First, the camera is pretty expensive, but everything Nest makes is. More importantly, the cloud video services are VERY expensive, and to get the full feature set you have to subscribe. Still, it's a great device, and I'd recommend it.
title: Clear video, great app. but...

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: CaptainJim
content: Originally, I was looking for a way to waterproof and mount the Nest Cams outdoor. Then this came out - problem solved. Yes, the subscription gets expensive if you have multiple cams - a big consideration. I don't know why they do not give a discount now that there are other less expensive choices in the marketplace. However, I like their cams and have used them since they were known as Dropcams. Easy installation if you have power nearby.
title: Just as good as the indoor Nest Cams

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Punisher2021
content: Bought these and work flawlessly. Have nigh vision, 2 way audio and an app that will blow you away. Can go back through footage, access through desktop, download video and will work with up to 10 cameras. You will have to pay for cloud storage afterwards but is 10 a month plus 5 more for each camera. Supports 5ghz wifi and have never had any issues with signal quality or disconnects. go for it you wont be disapointed
title: amazing setup

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: ltdan67
content: The initial setup and installation was quick and painless. The only thing of note is when you change your network id or pwd, you will need the id from the side of the camera. I wish I had known prior to installation. After I changed my SSID, I had to pull out the ladder and climb back up to get the number on the side of the camera. You can also scan the QR code, but again, I had to get up to the camera.
title: Good camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Technology
content: Easy installation and connects fast to home internet. I like that it sends notifications to your phone. You’re able to speak to someone from your phone and they are able to answer you back. Great for installing at the front door
title: Great Camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MechanicallyReclined
content: The camera performs well, and NEST has thought out the installation process. The kit includes all the hardware you need.
title: Installation is a snap

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Dano
content: Very happy with the Nest cameras. The only issue is they do disconnect often from our internet and not sure why. We have strong signals throughout our house but this problem seems to be common with other people I've talked to.
title: Great value for price

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Thatguy12345
content: This camera was very easy to setup and the app is great. I hardly get any false motion alerts and it is pretty good at identifying people. The only negative is that the USB cord has a huge connector which requires a large hole to pass the cable through a wall.
title: Very easy to setup

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: UpNorth
content: We added this to our existing setup. It was nice that one of them gets some complementary days of recording and then we can add it to our existing plan to keep billing simple.
title: Easy to connect and use

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: mjremi
content: Excellent product, in my opinion the best feature is the offsite continuous recording. Most offer motion recording, but you usually miss part of the event. I can also use to locate other things or check certain times. Highly recommend, must get the cloud recording to reach full value.
title: Great cameras, 24 hr recording!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: consumerinaz
content: It was 2 weeks after installation before I could enjoy the benefits of this camera. I have a normal-sized house and an excellent router but had to buy an extender and pay a geek to set it up so that I would have a constant connection. Nest should advise the customer to make note of the 6-digit number on the camera as it might be needed if there's a problem (and there was) and it's very difficult to see these numbers once the camera is installed.
title: Excellent image once it works

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: zapy
content: I have tried and used Arlo, Arlo Pro, and various other lesser known camera before deciding Nest is the way to go. I now have seven cameras and can't be happier. It is even better now that Nest has a less expensive recording option plan. Saves me a little bit every year but worth it at twice the price.
title: Rock solid performance

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: ScubaSteve
content: As with all Nest products they all work seamlessly together in the Nest app. Installation of the camera can be as easy or difficult as you want it to be. I chose to mount the camera on the soffit above the garage door and didn't want any wires showing. I drilled a hole in the soffit and fished the power cable through the attic and ran it to the power outlet for the garage door opener.
title: Easy to use camera with great video

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Antonio
content: I didn’t realize that the WiFi would be such a problem. Make sure it is strong or you will be very disappointed. The camera itself is sharp and it is easy to use.
title: Superb WiFi needed!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bradbury
content: This camera is amazing. Very user friendly and pairs seamlessly with all Nest equipment and the app. We don’t necessarily use it for the intended purpose (we spy on our dog durning the day) but it’s great.
title: Great quality!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: EWT1200
content: My purchase of the Nest - Cam Outdoor 1080p Wi-fi Network Surveillance Cameras (2-pack) - White was a fantastic buy. Well worth the money and you get 30days free of Cloud storage Nest Aware. To justify the cost I canceled my Amazon prime subscription and purchased the Nest Aware cloud storage for 1yr which is far more useful and important for my home. Therefore this annual expense is basically a wash.
title: est - Cam Outdoor 1080p Wi-fi Network Surveillance

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Brad
content: Bought these for security outside the home. Easy to install and set up. The App is great, you can see what's going on, right from your phone! Perfect cameras! Highly recommend!
title: Great outdoor cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: workathome
content:
Slowly adding one at a time to cover my entire house and perimeter, these things are great. Open the box and it pretty much gives you everything you need to install the camera. The magnetic mount is a great feature too. It's fairly sturdy so I doubt that it'll shift or fall.

I was kind of caught off guard by the extra and bulky power cable (surge protection?), but it makes sense for an outdoor product. Overall if you already have a NEST indoor cam, the next upgrade is this.
title: Great outdoor camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MEZ5
content: Easy set up. Can check in on cell phone. Get alerts for every movement, voice, or can tell you if it's a person! Picture is great!
title: Love!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Cebrady17
content: These security cameras are fantastic. Installation on my house was simple, I have a ranch, so was able to run the power through the roof overhang into the attic. Might be more difficult to install on other houses. Picture quality is fantastic, and the Nest app is also great. Highly recommended.
title: Fantastic Cameras

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: FrankB
content: Easy to install, integrates easily with NEST thermostat and fsmoke detectors. Watch live video from your mobile device or computer. Easily review notifications of activity any time and the ability to save if needed. I bought two and am subscribing to NEST Aware for notifications and over a weeks activity at your fingertips,
title: NEST Camera is the best

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Yooper1025
content: These were easy to install and the picture quality is great. I would definitely recommend this product it was worth every penny.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NitoDZ
content: Perfect for giving you a sense of security you can monitor when away from home, set perimeters,  looking forward to adding more

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

content:
100% satisfaction with this cameras, i can see/view everything around my house , who is in Or out, all in one package.
Thank you

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Montauk
content: Love the visibility and ease of use. Wish the sound and night vision was a little better.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Vipergtsr
content: A little pricey but good sound and image. Easy to install and setup

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Becky
content: This is our 5th Nest camera to purchase. It is working as expected. Really like the ease of installation!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Honeyskier
content: Easy to install. Works great. Amazing clear image. Set up for alerts when it sees motion, hears sound and actually will say sees someone. Feel so much better knowing what is going on at home looking on my phone app. Best camera and notification our there
title: Easy to install. Works great. Amazing clear image.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Lori
content: We love our nest so much, that we have purchased several for family
title: Safe and secure

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Chette4u
content: This was a great pick up. Set up was very easy. Clean and clear picture and storage. I want more
title: Awesome camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Radeberger123
content: Love that it notifies you when it spots a person (not just when it senses motion)...so cool! Easy-ish to install. Thought the magnetic mount wouldn't be strong enough but it holds in place very securely and allows you to pivot the camera so that it points exactly where you want it to. Yay Nest! Keep making fun stuff.
title: Great security camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: caverdon
content: We have the need to monitor our front porch to see when our outdoor cats show up each afternoon/evening. The Nest Cam was an easy installation and hook-up to our Wi-Fi was super easy. It's cool being able to monitor from anywhere we happen to be. The two-way audio is also much better than I was anticipating.
title: Nest Cam to the rescue

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: JinYang
content: Nest products tend to be a little more expensive than competitors, but they work well. Glad we bought these instead of others. Hardware quality is great and software is very easy to use, especially if you’re not so tech-savvy.
title: Excellent cameras, good value

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NicoleM
content: This was purchased in addition to the doorbell and they pair perfectly. I like having my “nest” secured with eyes (and ears!) in the front and back of the house. Easy to install and great image quality.
title: Nest Needs 2

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Maury
content: Nice camera very clear and quick response with google feature
title: Nice

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Sindee
content: The camera works great it's easy to figure out the correct colors at night. A few issues I've had is that it's supposed to continue working regularly and deleting the footage after 3 hrs after the trial month if you don't sign up for the subscription. However, that was not the case we weren't allowed to view any footage, and it was constantly stopping the recording and going "off-line". Since signing up with the subscription we've had no problems.
title: Great Security, but some faults

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SDAC
content: I added these two outdoor nest camera to my old dropcam. Every units came online without a hiccup. Now I have full coverage of my home from the 3 cameras.
title: Good value. Great quality for the price paid

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: TechLover
content: First off, the camera is amazingly simple to setup. Literally plug in, find your wifi, and hang on the wall. Boom - Done! The image is amazing! Its crystal clear. You can get notified when it sees activity or when it sees a person (and yes, it knows the difference between activity - aka squirrel - or a person - aka mailman). It comes with a feature where you can speak through the camera to the person on the other side. Worth the subscription!
title: Amazing Camera and Software

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: RHepl
content: I already owned the Nest doorbell camera which I have been very pleased with. I decided to expand the coverage of my system so I added these additional cameras. So far everything has been working very well together.
title: Easy to install and provides a great picture

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Mjke
content: Great pictures nice and clear easy to set up and install
title: Nice

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Bonnie
content: This is a great camera for the low cost! Great for proof that's needed when a delivery guy says he delivered a large, heavy box of a well known brand of cookware to your door when in fact he never even pulled in your driveway! Also great for finding out who's ringing your doorbell before you open the door, is it a girl scout selling cookies or a salesman selling solar panels? (I'll answer for the cookies!!) All in all, we are very satisfied!!
title: Great product! Very satisfied!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: MikeD
content: With security cameras you definitely get what you pay for. The Nest camera is super easy to set up. The packaging is great and includes everything you need to mount and install the camera. To get full benefit of the camera you do need Nest Protect service which does have a service fee. This service lets you archive video footage. If you just want to stream the camera to your phone and don't care about archived footage, then you can get away without it.
title: Great Camera and Easy Setup

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: cooltool
content: Although, we've purchased a few Nest items for ourselves, we decided share with others. Picked one of these up for my dad as a Christmas gift and he loves it. A little extra security for the front of the house to compliment his alarm system.
title: Gift for dad

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Larry
content: Have a hidden gate and just ask my Alexa Show Gen 2 to show me the gate and I get a perfect image of the gate to allow me to let the dog out safely. Takes about 5 seconds to show the image. No need for monthly subscription with type of application.
title: Great

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Snoopy76
content: We have had our Nest Outdoor camera’s for about 2 weeks now and they are great. They let us known if someone is approaching our home and the night vision is great. These camera’s are easy to install and it took me about 45 minutes to set-up and install the camera’s myself.
title: Awesome Product

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: GHBB
content:
Almost easy to setup (scanning the barcode was a pain).. Video looks crisp and can easily be controlled by multiple people in the house.

Does give a false alarm when it changes from regular mode to night mode. Audio talk is not the best, has its issues where you cant hear or its muffled.

Cant talk about the plan service since I am still in the 30day free plan but I think after that I get only images and no videos if I dont subscribe. The sad part of not subscribing is that there is no person detection.(they should atleast keep that)
title: Very Good Outdoor Camera

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: SeaplanePilot
content: This is my 4th cam for the exterior perimeter of my home. I bought 3 last year and they get addicting, so I bought another one this year to get an additional viewpoint and overlap. My previous units have exceeded my expectations and have functioned flawlessly over the past year in rain, snow, southern heat, hurricane-force winds, ice, etc.
title: The Best Consumer Security Cam

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Doris
content: I bought 4 of these. The quality is fantastic! I have a Villa and I feel much more secure. I have all of my property covered 24/7. I know when the mail arrives. I see the mailman at the box!. Cameras are very sensitive to anything outside. You can set so many things on these cameras. Amazing!
title: Great security camera!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Fridge
content: Easy to install and use.  We have other Nest products and they all sync well

I was shocked on how good this camera's quality is.

The set up was SUPER easy as they provide very good step by steps instructions. Make sure you test your wifi strength on where you want to consider installing the camera, might need a booster.

You can set zones so you get alerts when something motions in your zones. There is a "DVR" type function, however you do have to pay for that service via Nest.

Love this product!!

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

author: JReedNet
content:
Pros:
Ease of use, design, quality, software
Cons:
$100 year subscription for best recording
Cable does not detach from unit so it makes it non replaceable.
Cable is an odd length with an adapter in the middle between the camera's cable and a cable that plugs into a power outlet. I'd like to have seen one uniform cable from wall to camera that was replaceable and extendable.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White

author: bugaudiophile
content:
The build quality is excellent and it comes with all necessary hardware to mount the camera. 

Setup was easy (already had a Nest account). Just added it to my list of Nest products in the app and it was ready to go.

Image quality day/night is pretty good when zoomed all the way out but suffers when you try to zoom in on something. Audio quality is good and 2 way communication is pretty cool too.

Something I really like that I wasn't expecting is - even if you don't subscribe to the cloud service, it records 24/7 and you can still go back 10 days and view footage.

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: NestBad
content: Nest is sending me hourly emails when i turn my camera off. First, thats annoying. Second, it shows that they're monitoring my camera. Third, it shows they either dont get how people want to use cameras, or something more nefarious. Unhappy. Already spent hours on this. Will have to spend a few more to extract the vendor from my home. Think hard about your security before you buy this one.
title: Can't stop emails

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Nohti
content: I followed the directions for installation and it found my wireless connection just fine when plugged into the computer. I then moved it to the location I wanted it to be in - in a window - and tested it just inside the window and it worked fine. I then installed it in the outside of the window and it has constantly lost the signal. I checked the signal strength with my laptop and it gets a connection just fine (4 bars), so it appears to be a problem with the camera. I called the company and spent an hour with their tech people but in the end they had no solution other than the camera might have a problem getting a signal thru the glass. Has anyone else had this problem? By the way the router is about 30 feet from the camera, although there are a couple of walls between them (but note that my notebook worked just fine in the same location). Oh, and the tech suggested I get a router range extender – but I am not keep on spending more money on something that may or may not help.
title: Functions Only Intermittently

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: nana27
content:
Should have waited before purchasing. Some kinks in taking pictures.
Not always takes picture when movement.

title: good security camera but could be better

product: Google - Nest Cam Outdoor security camera - White
author: Zadig69
content: After installing the camera I was pleased with the quality and I especially loved the notifications. Little did I know that those notifications go away after the cloud trial period. Silly me, I thought the trial period was for the cloud based storage. Now, I have a device that not only does not record, but also it does not send me notifications. If I want notifications I need to spend an additional $100 per year. I have the nest thermostat and love it. I will most likely return the camera.
title: Camera is subpar without subscription
